availability.p: Available with prior consent of the CELT programme for purposes of academic research and teaching only.

Copyright for the printed edition rests with the School of Celtic Studies, Dublin Institute for Advanced Studies, Dublin. The electronic edition was compiled with the kind permission of the copyright owner.

titleStmt.title: Book of Leinster, formerly Lebar na Núachongbála
titleStmt.editor: R. I. Best, Osborn Bergin and M. A. O'Brien

samplingDecl.p: The present text represents pages 1–260 of the volume. All editorial introduction, notes and indexes have been omitted.

correction.p: Text has been checked and proofread twice. Missing text supplied by the editor is tagged sup.

normalization.p: The electronic text represents the edited text. Expansions to the text are marked ex.

segmentation.p: div0=the whole document; div1=the section; stanzas are marked lg.

interpretation.p: Names of persons (given names), and places are not tagged. Terms for cultural and social roles are not tagged.

profileDesc.creation: By Irish scribes in monastic scriptoria, based on older materials. 1150–1190

langUsage.language: The text is in Middle Irish.
Some words and phrases are in Latin.

div1.p:
IN PRINCIPIO fecit Deus celum &ersir; terram .i. Dori&ndot;gne Dia nem &ersir; talmain ar tús &ersir; ni fil tossach na forcend fairseom féin. Dori&ndot;gne chétus in maiss nemchruthaig &ersir; soillsi a&ndot;gel isin cetna domnuch. Doringne firmimint isin luan.
Doringni talmain &ersir; muire sin máirt. Doringne grein &ersir; ésca &ersir; renna nime sin cétain. Doringne enlaithe ind aeóir &ersir; tonnaitecha in mara sin dardain. Doringne anmanna in talman archena &ersir; Adam do &fdot;ollomnacht foraib isind aine. Ro chumsain iarum Dia issin t⋅athurn do forbthiugud dula nua &ersir; ní o &fdot;ollomnacht sain.

Dobert iar sain airchinnchecht nime do Lucifiur co noi &ndot;gradaib a&ndot;gel nime. Dobert dano airchinnchecht talman do Adam &ersir; do Eua cona claind. Imromadair iarum Lucifer (c)ombad tóesech trín slúaig a&ndot;gel. Ro timmart in Rí é co tríun sluaig a&ndot;gel leis i nItern &ersir; asbert Dia iarum fri muintir nime. Diumsach
inti Lucifer. Uenite ut confundamus consilium eius.

Ro formtig tra Lucifer fri Adam. derb leis iss é no bertha ( ) dara eis conid aire sin dochúaid I( )ar Du( ) i ndeilb nathrach. coro aslach immarbus for Adam &ersir; Eua im thomailt ind ubuill don chraund ergartha conid aire sin ro innarbbad Adam a Pardus
hi talmain coitchind.

Dolluid in Comdiu cuccu iar sain &ersir; atbert fri Adam .i. Terra es &ersir; in terram ibis .i. Do thalmain dotri&ndot;gned &ersir; i talmain raga. In sudore uultus tui comedes panem tuum .i. ni &fdot;uigbe sasad

cen saethar. Asbert dano frisin mnai. Cum dolore &ersir; gemitu paries
filios tuos &ersir; filias tuas .i. bid co &ndot;galar &ersir; co cneit tuisema do chlaind &ersir; do maccu. Ro immarbaigestar cland Adaim iarum .i. sinser Cain miscedach mac Adaim. Iar sin ro marbside a derbrathair .i. Abel tria saint &ersir; formut conid aire sin dorat Dia dilinn darsin n-uile ndomun.

Seth i&mmacr; in tres mac Adaim ica mbaí cland is uad atat fir domuin uile .i. Noe mac Lamech meic Mathusalem meic Enoc meicIared meic Malalel meic Cainain meic Eno s meic Seth meic Adaim. Uair is e Noe in tAdam dedenach cosa mbertar fir domuin uile ł Uair ro baid in diliu sil Adaim uile acht Noe cona thrí
maccaib .i. Sem. Cham. Iafeth acus a cethri mnaa .i. Cobba. &ersir; Olla. &ersir; Oliba. &ersir; Olibana.
O dorat iarum Dia dilind darsin uile &ndot;domun ní therna di doenib in domuin on dilind acht mad lucht na hairce .i. Noe cona trí maccaib. &ersir; ben Noe &ersir; mnaa a mac. Unde poeta cecinit.
Sem dī ro gab i nAssia. Cam i nAffraic Iafeth i nEoraip.

lg.l: Sem ro gab i nAssia n-ait.

div1.p:
Iafeth tra mac Nóe is uad tuascertleth na hAsia .i. Asia Becc. Armenia. Media. fir na Scithia & is uad lucht na hEoropa ule. Grecus mac Iafeth is uad in Grec Mór &ersir; in Grec Becc &ersir; Grec na hAlaxandrech. Hispanius mac Iafeth is uad Hispania. Gomerus
mac Iafeth da mac laiss Emoth &ersir; Ibath.

Emoth is uad fine thuascirt in domuin. Ibath da degmac leis .i. Bodb &ersir; Baath. Bodb diarbo mac Dói athair Elanius. Elanius i&mmacr; mac Doi tri meic leis .i. Armen. Negua. Isacon. Armen i&mmacr; coic meic leis Gotus. Cibidus. Uiligotus. &ersir; Burgandus &ersir; Lo&ndot;gbardus.
Negua tri meic leis Saxus. Boarus. Uandalus.

Hisicon i&mmacr; in tres mac Elanius cethri meic leis. Romanus. Francus. Britus. Albanus. Is e in tAlbanus ro gab Albuin ar tus &ersir; is uad ainmnigther Alba coro innarbad lais a brathair tar Muir nIcht conid uad Albanaig Letha ( )
Magoth mac Iafeth is dia chlaindseom na tuatha tancatar Herind ria &ndot;Gaedelaib .i. Partholon mac Sera meic Sru meic Braimin meic Fattecht meic Magoth meic Iafeth &ersir; Nemed mac Agnomain

meic Paimp meic Thaitt meic Sera meic Sruu &ersir; clanna Nemid .i. Galeoin &ersir; Fir Domnand &ersir; Fir Bolg &ersir; Tuatha De Danand amal
asbert in fili
Magoth mac an Iafeth
atá cinnti ach land
dib Partholon. Banba
robo chadla a band.
Ba dib Nemed noíthech
mac Agnomain óen
Ba díb Gand díb Genand
Sengand Slaine sóer.
Cland Eladan imda
ba díb Bres cen bréig ł
mac Eladan armgaíth
meic Delbaíth meic Néit.
Meic Innuí meic Allduí.
Alldui ba mac Taitt;
meic Thabuirn meic Eno
meic Baath meic Ebath aitt.
Meic Bethaig meic Iardain
meic Nemid hó Paimp Páim;
meic Thaitt meic &Sdot;era meic Srú
meic Braimin báin.
Braimin mac Fattecht
meic Magoth ba mór blad;
ro bása na n-amsir
com thadbsi ri mag. M

Baath indara mac Ibath meic Gomer meic Iafeth. is uad Gaedil &ersir; Fir na Scithia. Mac dó in fer amra airegda diarbo ainm Faenius Farsaid Iss éside indara toesech .lxx. dochoid do denam in Tuir Nebróith diaro scailtea na bérlai.

Nebroth i&mmacr; feisin mac Chaus meic Chaim meic Noe. Is é in
Faenius remrate tuc Bérla Féne ón Tur. & is aice buí in scol mór oc foglaim na n-ilbérla.

Dá mac i&mmacr; bátar oc Foenius .i. Noenual indala mac foracaib i flathius na Scithia dia éis. Nél in mac aile icon Tur rucadside &ersir; ba suíside na n-uile &mdot;berla. Conid aire táncas ara chend ó
&Fdot;oraind d'&fdot;oglaim na n-ilberla uad. Tánic i&mmacr; Faenius assind Assia dochum na Scithia assa lluid do denam in Tuir. co n-erbailt i flathius na Scithia i cind .xł. bliadan. Ocus co tarat toesigecht dia mac do Noenual.

Hi cind da bliadan .xł. tra iar ndenam in Tuir ro gab Nín mac
Béil rige in domuin. ar níro thriall nech aile smachtugud na tuath. ł na hilchenela do thabairt fó óenmám &ersir; fo chís &ersir; fó cháin acht seisium a óenur.

Toesig i&mmacr; batar and reme .i. in fer ba húasle &ersir; ba mó rath issin túaith iss e ba cend comairle do chách. no choisced cech n-ecóir
no gressed cech cóir. Ni thriallad insaigid. ł smacht ceneoil aile. Is hí sein trá amser hiro genair Gaedel Glass o tát Gaedil. ó Scotta ingen &Fdot;oraind. is uadi ainmnigtir Scuitt de Gaedelaib. ut dictum est
Féni o Fenius asbertar
brig cen dochta;
Gaedil ó Gaediul Glas garta.
Scuitt ó Scotta.
Is é Gaedel Glass ro chum in &ndot;Gaedilg asna da bérla sectmogat It é in so a n-anmandside.

Unde poeta cecinit.

A ⋅ein lin bérla cen meirg
asro theip Gaedel Gaedilg.
aichnid do ara érgna
na haicme na hilbérla

SRú mac Esrú tra meic Gaedil iss é toesech do Gaedelaib luid a hEgipt o ro báded Foraind cona ⋅lúag i mMuir Romuir.
i ndegaid mac nIsrael .Ixx &ersir; dcc. bliadan ó dílind co sin. Lucht cethri lo&ndot;g luid Srú a hEgipt. &ersir; cethri lanamna fichet cacha lunga &ersir; triar amus cacha lu&ndot;ga

Srú &ersir; a mac .i. Eber Scott. bátar iat toesig na llo&ndot;gse. Is in tansin atbath Noenual mac Baath meic Noenuail meic Foeniusa
Forsaid .i. flaith na Scithia. &ersir; marb Srú dano fo chetóir iar rochtain na Scithia. Gabais Éber Scott ar écin rige na Scithia os chlaind Noenuail co torchair la Nóemius mac Noenuail.

Boí cosnam eter Noimius &ersir; Boamain mac Ebir Scuitt. Gabais Boomain rige co n-erbailt. Gabais Rifill mac Noemi rige co torchair
la Taitt mac Ogomain Dorochair Taitt iarum do laim Refloir meic Rifill. Boí cosnam flathiusa iarum eter Reflóir mac Noemi

&ersir; Agnoman mac Taitt. Co torchair Reflóir la hAgnoman. Conid aire sin ro innarbad sil Gaedil for muir .i. Agnoman &ersir; Lam&fdot;ind a mac co mbatar .uii. &mdot;bliadna for muir timchiull
in domuin atuaid. Is lia turim an ro chesatar d'ulc.

Is aire thucad Lám&fdot;ind for mac Agnomain ar niba mó soillsi chaindell andate a lama ocond imram. Tri lo&ndot;ga díb &ersir; cengal eturru na digsed cach díb o 'raile. Tri toisig batar accu iar n-éc Agnomain forsin muinciund mór Mara Caisp .i. Lamfind &ersir; Alldoit
&ersir; Caicher drui. ł

Is é in Cacher druí dorat in leges dóib dia mboí in murdúchand oca medrad .i. boí in cotlud oca forrach frisin céol. Is é in leges fuair Cacher doib .i. ceir do legad na cluasaib. Is é Cacher ro ráid friu dia ruc in gáeth mór iat issin n-ocian coro chesaiset mór
re gortai &ersir; re híttaid and. Co torachtatar i cind sechtmaine in rind mór atá a Sliab Rifi fothuaid. Conid isin rindsin fuaratar
topor co mblas &fdot;ína coro lo&ndot;gset and. Co mbatar tri láa &ersir; teora aidche na cotlud and sin. Co n-erbairt Cacher druí. érgid ar se ni anfam co rrísam Herind. Cia hairm atá ind Heriu ar Lám&fdot;ind
mac Agnomain. Is fate ar Cacher andás in Scithia. & ni sind féin ric ar Cacher acht ar cland ricfat i cind trí chét &mdot;bliadan ó 'ndiu. Gabsat iar sin na Gaethlaige Meotecda. Acus is and sin
rucad mac do Lámind .i. Eber Glun&fdot;ind .i. comartha gela ro batar fora glunib. Is hé ba toesech dar éis a athar. Ua dóside Febri
Glun&fdot;ind. ua dóside Nuado.
Is hé in Bráth tanic asna Gaethlaigib iar fut Mara Torrian do Chréit &ersir; do &Sdot;icil. Róisit co Hespáin iar sain. gabsat Hespain

ar écin. Agnoman tra mac Taitt iss e tóesech tanic de Gaelaib assin Scithia. Da mac lais .i. Lam&fdot;ind &ersir; Elloth. Óenmac ic
Lam&fdot;ind .i. Eber Glunind. Mac oc Elloth .i. Eber Dub i comamsir isna Gaethlaigib. Da hua occo i comlaith .i. Toecht mac Tetrig meic Ebir Duib. Acus Noenel mac Febri meic Agni meic Ebir
Glunind. Ocus Soecht mac Mantain meic Cachir. Ucca &ersir; Occa da mac Aldoith meic Noenil meic Nemid meic Alloid meic Ogamain
meic Thoechta meic Teitrig meic Ebir Duib meic Elloith.

Lucht cethri lo&ndot;g trá. tancatar Gaedil co Hespain. Cethri lanamna déc cecha lu&ndot;ga. &ersir; secht n-amois cen mnaa. Bráth lucht lu&ndot;ga. Ucce &ersir; Occe lucht da lo&ndot;g. Da brathair iat .i. da mac Elloid meic Noenill meic Nemid meic Alloit meic Ogamain
Mantan mac Cachir druad meic Ercada meic Oitechta. lucht lunga. Tri catha i&mmacr; ł ro brissiset iar &ndot;dul i nEspain .i. cath for Tóesen cath for Lo&ndot;gbardu. cath for Barchu. Co tanic tam forru co n-apdatar .xxiiii. díb im Occe &ersir; im Ucce. Noco térna assna da lui&ndot;g acht da .u. im Én mac Occe &ersir; Ún mac Ucce.

Bai mac maith ic Brath .i. Bregon cá &ndot;dernad in Tor &ersir; in chathir .i. Brigantia ainm na cathrach. A Tur Bregoin i&mmacr; atchess Heriu fescur lathi gemreta. Atoscondairc Ith mac Bregoin. Unde Gilla Coemain cecinit.
GAEdel Glass ó tat Gaedil
macside Níuil nertmaínig
robo thrén tíar &ersir; tair.
Nel mac Fóeniusa Forsaid.
Da mac ic Fáenius fír dam.
Nél ar n-athair &ersir; Noenal;
rucad Nél ocon Tur tair.
Noinel con Scithia sciathglain.
Srú mac Esru meic Gaedil
ar senathair slúag&fdot;aelid;
is é luid fothuaid dia thaig
dar ucht Mara ruaid Romair.
Lucht cethri lo&ndot;g lín a slúaig.
for fut Mara Romair ruaid;
tall ina cláradba is cet
cethri lanamna fichet.
Flaith na Scithia ba gním glan.
in gilla diarbo ainm Noenal.
is and atbath tall ca thaig.
tan ráncatar Gaedil.
Gabais Eber Scot na scal
os chlaind Noenil co nefnar;
co torchair can chaenius cain.
la Noemius mac Noenil.
Nertmar mac Ebir iar tain
diarbo ainm brechtgal Beomain.
co traig Mara Caisp ba rí
co torchair do láim Noemi.
Noimius mac Noenil ind nirt
ro gab in Scithia sciathbricc;
doceir in flaith comlán cain.
la Ogmán mac Beomain.
Ogmán iar sain ba flaith
dar éisi Noemi nertmaith;
co n-erbailt na chríne cen chill
dara éis ba rí Refill.
Dorochair Refill iar tain.
do laim Thait meic Ogamain.
dorochair Tait cencor thim.
do laim Reflóir meic Refill.
Refloir Agnoman cen on
ré .iiii. bliadna i cosnam.
co torchair Refloir ragel.
la mac Tait la Agnoman.
Noinel is Refill co rind
dá mac Reflóir meic Refill;
innarbsat Agnoman ass.
darin muir merda mórglass.
Mathi na tóisig ba día
tancatar assin Scithia
Agnoman Eber cen ail
da mac Thaitt meic Ógamain.
Elloth. Lám&fdot;ind. Lamglass léir.
tri meic Agnomain imréil;
Cacher is Ci&ndot;g clú co mbúaid
dá degmac Ebir echrúaid.
Arim a llo&ndot;g tri lo&ndot;ga.
ic tiachtain dar tromthonna;
trí fichit cach lui&ndot;g luad &ndot;gle.
&ersir; mna cach tres fiche.
Atbath Agnoman nirbo aisc
i n-insib Mara morChaisp.
bale i mbátar re bliadain
i fuaratar rodiamair.
Ráncatar Muir Libis lan
seolad sé samlaithe slán.
Glass mac Agnomain nirbo dis.
and atbath i Caronisł
Caín inis fuaratar and
for Muir Libis na laechland
rathi for bliadain co mblaid
a n-aittreb sinn indsisin.
Seolait for muir monor &ndot;gle
eter lathi &ersir; aidche.
taitnem lám Lamind laindrig
ba cosmail fri caemchaindlib.
Cethri tóisig dóib nir dis
iar tiachtain dar Muir Líbis;
Elloth. Lámind lúath dar ler.
Cing is a brathair Cacher.
Cacher fuair leges dóib thall.
arna medrad don murdchand;
is é leges fuair Cacher cain.
céir do legad na cluasaib.
Is é Cacher comol gle
dori&ndot;gne doib fastine;
ic Sleibte Rifi con rind.
ni &fdot;il foss dún co Herind.
Cia hairm i fil ind Heriu ard.
ar Lám&fdot;ind in laech langarg;
is fata asbert Cacher and
ni sind ric acht ar mórchland.
Ci&ndot;gset inna cath co fí
fodess sech rinne Rifí;
clanda Gaedil co &ndot;glaine.
ro gabsat na Gaethlaige.
Genair mac irdairc and sain.
do Lámind mac Agnomain
Éber Glúnfind glan in gríb.
senathair foltchas Febríg.
Fini Gaedil gasta glain.
ccc. bliadan forsin tirsin;
ro threbsat and ó ⋅ein immach.
noco tanic Brath buadach.
Bráth degmac Deatha dil.
tanic do Créit do &Sdot;icil;
lucht cethri lo&ndot;g seolta sláin
desel nEorpa co Hespáin.
Occe &ersir; Ucce cen ail
da mac Elloith meic Noenil.
Mantán mac Cachir Brath dil.
ba siat na cethri tóesig.
Cethri fir déc cona mnáib.
ba lucht do cach lui&ndot;g laechláin.
&ersir; sesseor amos án.
roinset tri catha i nHespain.
Ard in cetchath noco chél
ro roinset for sluag Toessén;
cath for Barco ba gor gó.
&ersir; cath for Lo&ndot;gbardo.
Ba dar éis in chatha clé
tánic doib tám oenlaithe;
lucht lo&ndot;g mac nElloith cen chron.
marba uile acht dechenbor.
Doriachtatar ass Ún is Én
da degmac na tóesech trén;
iar sain ro genair Bregoin.
athair Bili in balcdremoin.
Ro briss mór comlond is chath.
for sluag Espáin illadach.
Bregon na &ndot;glórgal na &ndot;glia.
leis doronad Brigantia.
Bregoin mac Bratha blaith bil.
is dó robo mac Milid;
.uii. meic Miled maith a slóg
im Éber im Herimon.
Deich meic Bregoin cen meirbe.
Brego Fuat is Murthemne;
Cuail&ndot;ge. Cualo. Blad. cia bé.
Ebleó. Nar. Íth is Bilé.
Ith mac Bregoin co mblaid bind.
tanic ar tús i nHerind;
is é fer toesech ros treb
do ⋅il noesech nertGaedel. G.
Scuirem ifechtsa do scélaib na &ndot;Gaedel coro aisnídem dona .uii. tuathaib ro gabsat Herind rempo.

RO gab ém Cessair ingen Betha meic Noe .xl. láa ria &ndot;dilind Partholon mac Sera. tri chét bliadan iar &ndot;dilind. ł Nemed mac Agnomain do Grecaib Scithia i cind .xxx. bliadan iar Partholon. Fir Bolg iar sain. Fir Domnand iar sain. Galioin iar sain. Tuatha Dé Danand iar tain. Unde Fintan cecinit.
HERiu cia iarfaigther dím
atá lim co grind.
cach gabal ros gab
o thus betha bind
Dolluid anair Cessair
ingen Betha in ben
cona coicait ingen
cona triur fer.
Tarraid diliu Bith
ina ⋅léib cen rúin.
Ladru i nArd Ladrand
Cessair ina cúil.
Bliadain dam fo dílind déin.
i Taul Tuinne thend;
ní &fdot;uarus ní im thomaltus
cotlud bad &fdot;err.
Misse i nHerind sund
ba suastin mo ⋅ét;
conos toracht Partholon
anair a tír Gréc.
Messe sund i nHerind fós.
sisi Heriu fás;
co tanic mac Agnomain
Nemed nimtha gnás.
Fir Bolg is Fir Galión
tancatar ba cían.
tancatar Fir Domnand
gabsat i nIrrus tíar.
Iar sain tancatar Tuatha Dé
ina caipaib ciach cían
co 'motormalt damsa friu
ciarbo ⋅aegul cían.
Iar sain tancatar meic Miled
a Hespain anes.
co 'motormalt damsa friu
ciar thrén a tress.
Doroacht saegul sír
damsa nocho chel;
conom tharraid creitem óg
o Rig nime nél.
Misse Fintan find
mac Bochra ni chél;
d'éis na dílend sund
am sruith uasal hér. H.
Incipit de gabalaib Herend.

ROs gab iarum Cessair ingen Betha meic Nóe ut praediximus. .xx ł ł. laa ria ndilind. Is é fochond a tiachtana. ar teched na
dilend. Uair asbert Nóe friu. Ergid ar se co himmel iartharach in domain bes noco ria in diliu. Lucht tri mbárc. Dosrala do Dun na mBárc hi crích Corco Duibne. Ro battea di bairc díb. Térna
Cessair lucht a bairce .i. l. ingen &ersir; triar fer .i. Bith mac Nóe dia tá Sliab Betha. is and ro hadnacht i carn mór Slébe Betha. Ladru

luam dia tá Ard Ladrand. is é cetna marb dochoid fo úir Herend. Fintan mac Bochra dia tá Fert Fintain os Tul Tuinne. Atbath
Cessair i Cuil Chesra la Connacta. cona coicait ingen. It é in so
a n-anmandside ut Fintan cecinit.
CAín raind ro randsammar etrond
messe is Bith is Ladru lond
ar síd is ar céill dori&ndot;gne
imon .l. ingen oll.
Sect mna déc rucus im Chessair
Lot is Luam is Máil is Barr.
Froecar Femar Faible Foroll.
Ciper Torrian Tamall Tam
Abba Ulla Raichne Sille
is é lín baí sinne and.
A sé déc ruc Bith ri Bairind
Sella Della Duib addéos.
Fotra Traige Nera Buana
Tamall. Tanna Nathra Leos.
Fodarg Rodarg Dos Clos rocluinter
rop iat sain ar munter beos. ł
A sé déc iar sain re Ladraind.
Alba Bona.
Gothiam Germán Aithne. Inne
Rodarg. Rinne. Iachor Ain.
Irrand. Espa. Sine. Samoll
rop é sain ar commond cain. .C.
Niro gab nech tra do ⋅íl Adaim Herind ría ndílind acht sain.,

Ba fás tra Heriu iar sain fri ré tri chét &mdot;bliadan ł .xii. ar .ccc.
quod uerius est. Conos toracht Partholon mac Sera meic Srú. is é cetarogab Herind iar &ndot;dílind dia mairt for .xiiii. esca. i nInbiur
Scéne. Uair fo thrí ro gabad Heriu a hInbiur Scéine. Do chlaind
Magoth meic Iafeth é ut diximus. Isin t⋅escatmad bliadain aisi Abráim ro gab Partholon Herind.

Cethrur airech tanic Partholon .i. Sé féin. &ersir; Laíglinne a mac dia tá Loch Laíglinne la Hú Mac Cuais Breg. Slanga &ersir; Rudraige da mac aile Partholoin. Dia tá Slíab Slanga &ersir; Loch Rudraige. In tan ro class a &fdot;ert Rudraige is and ro memaid in loch fo thír.

Secht &mdot;bliadna do Partholon i nHerind in tan atbath in cét&fdot;er
dia muntir .i. Fea dia tá Mag Fea. uair is and ro hadnacht i mMaig Fea. Isin tres bliadain iar sain cétchath Herend ro briss Partholon i Slemnaib Maige Ítha for Cichol &ndot;Gricenchos d'&Fdot;omórch- aib. &ersir; fir co n-oenlámaib &ersir; co n-oenchossaib ro &fdot;ersat friss in cath.

Secht lochthomadmand i nHerind i n-amsir Partholoin .i. Loch Láeglinne la Ú Mac Cuais Breg. Loch Cuan &ersir; Loch Rudraige la hUltu. Loch &ndot;Dechet &ersir; Loch nEchtra &ersir; Loch Con la Connacta. &ersir; Loch nEchtra la Airgialla. Ár ni fuair Partholon ara cind i nHerind acht tri locha &ersir; ix. n-aibne .i. Loch Fordremain i Sléib Mis. &ersir;
Loch Lumnig fo thír. Findloch Cera i nIrrus. Aband Lifi &ersir; Luí. &ersir; Muad &ersir; Slicech &ersir; Samaír forsa tá Es Rúaid. Find &ersir; Modorn. Buas &ersir; Banna. eter Le &ersir; Elle.

Cethri blíadna ria n-éc Partholoin tomaidm Brennai fo thír. Ro slechta cethri maige la Partholon i nHerind. Mag nÍtha la Laigniu.
Mag Tuired la Connactu. Mag Lí la Hú Mac Cuais. Mag Ladrand la Dál nAraide. Ar ni fuair Partholon ara chind i nHerind acht óenmag .i. Senmag nÉtair. Is aire atberar Senmag de ar nír ás
frén na flesc feda trit riam. & is andside atbath Partholon míle fer &ersir; iiii. mile ban do thám sechtmaine. i k ł maí. Dia lúain ros
gab tám &ersir; ros marb uile in tam ule acht oen&fdot;er tantum .i. Tuan mac Stairn meic Sera mac brathar Partholoin. &ersir; ro ndelb Dia i rrichtaib imdaib. &ersir; ro mair in t-oen&fdot;ersain o amsir Partholoin co hamsir Finnen &ersir; Coluim Chille. Co nd-ecaid dóib gabala Herend
o amsir Chesra cetaragab cosin n-amsirsin. &ersir; is é sin Tuán mac
Cairill meic Muridaig Mundeirg. Is dósin ro chan in suí senchasa in laídse sís. ł
A Choemu clair Cuind cóem&fdot;ind

cia dám iar tustin talman
cetatarlad for Herind.

feib adrímim a retha.
fo&fdot;uair féin fessaig findgil
im Chessair ingin Betha.
Bith mac Noe na n-ildrem
cid ro chloí re cladband.
marb i Sleib Betha is badbu.
marb Ladru i nArd Ladrand.

Is iat in cethrur airech .i. Starn &ersir; Iarbonel Fáid &ersir; Annind &ersir; Fergus

Munremair la Luigne. Loch &ndot;Dairbrech. Loch nAnnind i mMide. In tan ro class a &fdot;ert &ersir; a adnacul Annind meic Nemid is and ro mebaid in loch fo thír.

Is é Nemed ro bris cath Ruis &Fdot;roechain for Gend &ersir; Sengand da ríg Fomore. &ersir; ro marbtha a ndís and. Ro class di rígráith
la Nemed i nHerind .i. Raith Chimbáeth i Semne. Raith Chind Eich la Hu Niallain. Cethri meic Matan Munremair ro chlaidset Raith Chind Eich i n-oenló. .i. Boc &ersir; Roboc. Ruibne &ersir; Rotan. Ro marbtha ria matain la Neimed riasíu no chintís in claide.

Ro slecta dá mag déc i ndaire lige la Nemed i nHerind. Mag
Cera &ersir; Mag nEba. &ersir; Mag Cúili Tolaid. &ersir; Mag Seimne la Connactu. Mag Seired la Tethba. Mag Tochair i Tir Eogain. Mag Semne la Araidiu. Mag Macha la Airgialla. Mag &mdot;Bernsa la Laigniu. Lecmag la Mumain. &ersir; Mag Moda. Ro bris tri catha for Fomóre .i. loi&ndot;gsig
na fairgge .i. Cath Badbgna la Connacta. Cath Cnamrois la Laigniu.
Cath Murbuilg i nDal Riatai. Atbath Neimed iar sin do thám i nAilen Arda Nemid. i nHuib Liathain.

Boí dochraite mór for clannaib Nemid dara eise i nHerind .i. Ó Morc mac Deled &ersir; ó Chonand mac Febair. dia tá Tor Conaind. risi n-apar Torinis Chetni indiu. Is inti boí morlo&ndot;gas na Fomore.
Da trian clainne &ersir; etha &ersir; blecta fer &ndot;Herend. cacha samna co Mag Cetni. Ro gab tra ferg &ersir; tursi firu Herend re trumma in chísa. Lotar uile do chathugud frisna Fomóre. Trí daglaích occu .i. Semul ł mac Iarbonéoil Fátha meic Nemid. Herglan mac Beoain meic Stairn meic Nemid. Fergus Lethderg mac Nemid. Tricha míle
for muir. tricha mile aile for tír. Ro thoglatar in Tor. Dorochair Conand cona chlaind. Conid iarsin togailsin dosfarraid Morc mac Deiled. Lucht tri fichet long co torchratar comthuttim. &ersir; tanic in muir dar firu Herend &ersir; niro theich fer díb o cheile la duire in
chathaigthe. conna terna díb acht óenbarc i mbatar .xxx. tren&fdot;er.
Lotarside ass for scaíl a Herind for teiched in galair &ersir; in chíssa .i. Marb Bethach i nHerind de thám. A deich mnaa dia éis fri ré tri &mdot;bliadan fichet. Luid Matach &ersir; Hérglan &ersir; Iartach .i. trí meic Beóain co Domon &ersir; co Herdomon i tuascirt Alban. Semión i tírib Gréc. Fororbart a clandside i suidiu co mbatar i mmílib.

de thám i Fremaind. Sengand .u. bliadna co torchair la Fiacha Cenfinnan mac Stairn meic Rudraige meic Dela. Fiacha .u. bliadna. Cenfinna uile bae Herend na erchomair. co torchair la Rinnail mac Genaind meic Dela. Rinnail .ui. bliadna co torchair la Fodbgenid mac Sengaind meic Dela. i nEba Choirpri. Odbgenid .iiii.
bliadna co torchair i mMaig Murthemne la Eochaig mac Rinnail. meic Genaind meic Dela. Eocho mac Eirc .x. &mdot;bliadna. Ni boí fleochod ra ré acht drucht. Ní baí bliadain cen mess. Ro curthea gai a Herind re lind. Is leis doronad in recht cóir i nHerind ar tús. Dorochair tra Eocho mac Eirc la tri maccaib
Nemid meic Badrui. Is é sin cétrí do rind ro gáet ar tús i nHerind. Unde Colum Cille cecinit. Dena mo resnis a meic. &ersir;c.

i n-insib ł tuascertachaib in domain oc foglaim druidechta &ersir; fessa &ersir; fastini &ersir; amainsechta. Combtar fortaile for cerddib suíthe gentliucta. Combtar iat Tuatha De Danand tancatar Herind.

Is amlaid tancatar i nnélaib dorchaib. Gabsat for slebe Conmaicne Réin. la Connacta. & ro láset temel tri la &ersir; tri haidche
for gréin. Cath ł rige conatchetar for Feraib bolg. Fe hta cath eturru .i. cétchath Maige Tuired. hi torchratar cét mílec d'&Fdot;eraib Bolg. Gabsat iar sain rige &ndot;Herend.
Tuath Dea tra in sin .i. dee in t-aes dána. Andei i&mmacr; in t-aes

Nuadu Argatlám tra iss é ba rí do Thuaith De Danand .uii. &mdot;bliadna riana tiachtain i nHerind coro benad a lám de i cétchath
Maige Tuired. Edleo mac Aldoí is é cet&fdot;er dorochair i nHerind de Tuaith De Danand do láim Nerchoin hú Semioin. Hi cetchath Maige Tuired dorochratar Ernmas &ersir; Echtach &ersir; Etargal &ersir; Fiachra.
Gabais Bress mac Eladan iar sen rige &ndot;Herend. Co cend .uii. &mdot;bliadan coro íccad lám Nuadat. Nuado Argatlam iarum .xx.
bliadan. Lám argait co lánlúth cacha láma in cach meór &ersir; in cach alt dorat fair. Dían Cecht. in liaig. &ersir; Créidne cerd i co&ndot;gnam fris.

Taltiu i&mmacr; ingen Magmóir ríg Espane banrígan Fer &mdot;Bolg. Tanicside iar cur áir Fer &mdot;Bolg issin chétchath Maige Tuired co
Caill Cúan. &ersir; slechtaither lé in chaill corbo mag scothemrach ria cind bliadna. Is hí in Tailtiusa ba ben Echach meic Eirc ríg Herend.
Coro marbsat Tuatha De Danand é. Is é mac Eirc dosfuc a Hespáin o hathair .i. o Magmór Mall rig Hespane. Taltiu tra ro threbastar i Tailtin &ersir; ra &fdot;aí re Eocho &ndot;Garb mac Duach Daill de Thuathaib
De Danand. & dorat Cían mac Déin Checht .i. Scál Balb ainm aile dó. a mac di for altrom .i. Lug. Eithne ingen Balair Bailcbeimnig a mathairside. Co n-erbailt iar saín Tailtiu hi Taltin co tartdad a hainm furri. & conid hí a &fdot;ert fil ond &Fdot;orud Thailten sairtúaid. Co ndénta a cluiche cacha bliadna ic Lug .i.
Coícthiges ria lugnasad &ersir; coicthiges iar lugnasad. Lugnasad .i. noasad Loga meic Eithnend ainm in chluiche.

Nuado Argatlam tra dorochair i cath dedenach ł Maige Tuired. & Macha ingen Ernmais do láim Balair Balcbeimnig. Isin chathsin dorochair Ogma mac Eladan meic Neit. la hIndech mac De ríg
na Fomorach. Dorochratar Bruidne &ersir; Calmál lo hOchtrilach mac
nInnich. Iar marbad tra Nuadat &ersir; na ferso sin chathsain doratsat Tuatha De Danand rígi do Lug. & dorochair lais a ⋅enathair co cloich assa thabaill. Sochaide tra ro marbad sin chathsa co mBress
maroen friu. Amal atrubairt Indech mac Dé Domnand in rí
&ersir; fer co ndanaib &ersir; eladnaib éside. dar iarfaig Lug dó cia lín dorochair sin chathsain Maige Tuired. .i. Secht fir .uii. fichit .uii. c. uii. l. l. noí cét .xx. .xx łł. imm ua Néit nocha. .i. im Ogma mac Eladan meic Néit. Baí tra Lug mac Eithnend .xl. bliadan i rrige &ndot;Herend dar eis in chatha dedenaig Maige Tuired. Secht
&mdot;bliadna fichet eter na da chathsa Maige Tuired.

Boí Eocho Ollathir .i. in Dagda Mór mac Eladan .lxxx. bliadan
i rríge &ndot;Herend. Is fair ro gniset fir Herend Sid in Broga. &ersir; a thrí meic .i. Oengus &ersir; Aed &ersir; Cermait Cáem. Tri meic oc Dían Checht .i. Cú &ersir; Chethen &ersir; Chian. &ersir; Minach in cethramad mac cenco
n-airmet sochaide. & a ingen Etan baneices. &ersir; Airmed banliaig. ind ingen aile. & Coirpre mac Etna in file. Crichinbel. &ersir; Bruidne. &ersir; Casmael na tri cainte. Be Chuille &ersir; Dianand na dí bantuathig. Tri meic Cermata meic in Dagda .i. Mac Cuill; Mac Cecht; Mac
Grene. Sethor &ersir; Tethor &ersir; Chethor a n-anmand. Fotla &ersir; Banba &ersir;
Heriu a trí mnáa. Fea &ersir; Nemaind dí mnaí Néit. a quo Ailech Néit. Flidais dia tá Buar Flidais. a cethri ingena. Airgoen &ersir; Bé Chuille &ersir; Dinand &ersir; Bé Théite. Dí ríg damraide .i. Fea &ersir; Femen dia tá Mag Fea &ersir; Mag Femin. Da dam dile insin. Torc Triath rí torcraide día tá Mag Treitherne. Cirba rí moltraide dia ta
Mag Cirba. Math mac Úmóir in druí. Badb &ersir; Macha &ersir; Anand. dia tát Cichi Anand i lLuachair. tri ingena Ernbais na bantuathige.
Goibnend goba. &ersir; Luicne sáer. &ersir; Creidne cerd. & Dian Cecht in liaig.

Delbaeth dar éis in Dagdai .x. &mdot;bliadna i rríge &ndot;Herend co
torchair &ersir; a mac la Cacher mac Námat brathair Nectain. Gabais Fiachna mac Delbáeith ríge dar éis a athar .x. &mdot;bliadna aile. Co torchair Fiachna &ersir; ui. meic Ollaman la Eogan Inbir Móir. XXix. &mdot;bliadna d'uíb in Dagdai i rrige Herend .i. Mac Cuill. Mac
Cecht. Mac Grene. Randsat Herind i trí eturru. &ersir; ni &fdot;argsat maccu
etir. Sethor &ersir; Tethor &ersir; Cethor a n-anmand. Cuccu tancatar
Gaedil. Co torchratar la macaib Miled ł Espain i ndígail Itha &ersir; Chuail&ndot;ge &ersir; Fuait tri meic Bregoin in sin.

Lug mac Céin meic Déin Checht meic Erairc meic Néit. Is é cétaranic fidchill &ersir; liathroit &ersir; echlaisc &ersir; oenach i nHerind. Unde quidam cecinit.
Lug mac Ethlend alt cen meirg.
leis cetna acht oenach ard;
ic caíni Crist ní bág báeth.
atbath Conchobor gaeth garg.ł

Cacher &ersir; Nechtain da mac Namat meic Echach Gairb meic Duach
Themin meic bressi meic Delbaeith meic Néit.
Siugmall mac Corpri Chruim. meic Ercmaire meic Delbaeith meic Ogma.
Oengus Mac Óc &ersir; Aed Cáem &ersir; Cermait Milbel tri meic in Dagdai in sin.
Corpre File mac Tuarda meic Turill meic Caitt Conatchind meic Ordaim meic Allui meic Thait.
Gaíla mac Oirbsen meic Elloith meic Eladan meic Delbaeth meic Néit.

Oirbsen ainm Manannain ar tús. is uad ainmnigther Loch
nOrbsen i Connactaib. In tan ro hadnaicced Manannan is and ro memaid in loch fo thír.
Sé meic Delbaeth meic Ogma meic Eladan meic Delbaeth meic Neit .i. Fiachra. Ollom. Innui. Brian. Iuchorba. Iuchair.

Donand ingen don Delbaeth chetna .i. mathair in triir dedenaig
.i. Briain &ersir; Iucharba &ersir; Iuchair. Ba siat sin na tri dee dana. dia tá Sliab na Trí &ndot;Dee.
Tuirill mac Caitt i&mmacr; senathair Corpri Filed &ersir; Etan ingen Déin Checht mathair in Tuirill.

Tri meic Cermata i&mmacr; ut diximus. Mac Cuill .i. Sethor coll a dea.
Mac Cecht .i. Tethor cecht a dea. Mac Grene .i. Cethor. grian a dea. Fotla ben Meic Cecht. Banba ben Meic Cuill. Heriu ben Meic Grene. Tri ingena Fiachna meic Delbaeth sen.
Ernmas ingen Etarlaim meic Nuadat Argatlaim mathair na tri &mdot;bansa. &ersir; mathair Fiachna &ersir; Olloman.
Tri ingena aile dano oc Ernmais .i. Badb &ersir; Macha. &ersir; Mórrigu .i. Anand a hainmside.

A trí meic .i. Glond &ersir; Gním &ersir; Coscur. Boind ingen Delbaeth meic Eladan. Fea &ersir; Nemaind dí mnaí Néit meic Indui dí in gin Elcmair in Broga. Uillend mac Cathair meic Nuadat Argatlaim.
Bodb Sída ar Femen mac Echach Gairb meic Duach Temin. Abcan mac Bic Felmais meic Con meic Dein Cecht. fili Loga. Én mac Biceoin meic Sathirn meic Edleo meic Aldui meic Thait meic Thabuirn. ł Oc Tait mac Thabuirn condrecat forcla Tuathe De Danand. Is dósain ro chan in senchaid.
HERiu co n-uaill co n-idnaib
sinsit sluaig fora senmaig;
síar co fuin ropdar foglaig
a tuir thoglaig im Themraig.
.XXXa. bliadan iar &ndot;Genand
gabsat sluaig siabro sonam
for tuaith Bolc buaibthe barand
tadall Tuathe De Donand.
Dia do dáim ced dosrimrit
gabsat co &ndot;grain co nglanalt.
na neol olcoichthe
for sleib Conmaicne Connacht.
Cen dechla Herend derend ergnaid.
cen ethra herim a&ndot;gbaid
ni fessa fir for nim
in do nim no do thalmain.
Mas do demnaib diabuil
don lo&ndot;gais lengduib laídig.
slam co srethaib co slógaib
cland Bethaig mas do daínib.
Do daínib a ndír dligid
in saergein dian síl serig
Bethach Fianailen fobaid
mac d'Iarbonel mac Nemid.
Ni theilgset dáil na dliged
im ined Fáil co fuiled
robán a daig &ersir; debech
ma deired i mMaig Tuired.
Tuatha Dé ba tolg tréine
im Thuaith bolg basit ríge.
inna cath co méit ualle.
atbath cuane cét mile.
Meicc Eladan aeb indna.
fri fera doil fael fodla.
Bres don Brug belgaeth Banba.
Dagda Delbaeth is Ogma.
Heriu cid rotbla roa.
Banba Fotla &ersir; Fea
Nemaind nar fodaind fathaig.
Donand mathair na ndea.
Badb is Macha mét indbais
Morrígan. Fotla felbais.
indlema ind ága ernmais.
ingena ána Ernmais.
Goibnend nir baeth bruidne
Luichtene saer cherd Creidne.
Dían Cecht frí dul rót roichthe.
Mac ind Óc Lug mac Eithne.
Crichinbel bruinde bladach.
Bé Chuille Dinand drechach.
Cosmael co mbairdne becdai
Corpre mac Etna is Etan.
Huí in Dagdai diarbo threrand
ran na mbuaball
flaithe febgarta adfiadam
tri meic Cermata Cualand.
Cid Heriu ilair mile
randsat a tír i tréide
airich uill na n-ech n-ualle.
Mac Cuill. Mac Cecht. Mac Grene
Glé dosroíbaid dia n-irind.
Mac Dé don rignaig rédim
fri gail na &ndot;gním na &ndot;gleraind
ni &fdot;il a síl for Herind. H.
Eochaid cen elmnas n-idland
delbas deochair a degrand.
for fis na fian dia fuiglend
cia dosruirmend nis adrand.
Adraid ainm ind Ríg dobrórand
fodlaid cech fír adfeidend
ro sern cach sín arsailem
Ro delb dír n-oibeng Herend. H.

Tanaide cecinit.
TUatha De Donand fo diamair
fir cen chomall crabuid.
Cuileoin in chaille na crínaig
daene d'&fdot;uil&fdot;eóil Adaim.
Uasle thall na tuathe thréine
lucht na cruache criíne.
aisneidem in dreimse i támne
a reimse 's a ríge.
Ré .uii. &mdot;bliadna Nuadat nareng
óssin chuanairt cheib&fdot;indł
flathius ind &fdot;ir chichmair chul&fdot;ind
ria tiachtain i nHerind.
I Maig Thuired truim cen trucha
i torchair cuing in chatha.
cosnamaid ban in betha
ro lead lám latha.
.Uii. &mdot;bliadna Bressi na mbánat.
lór a dessi don duanabb;
i flathius ósin chlár chnóboc
coro íccad lám Nuadat.
Nuado iar sein .xx. bliadan
ruc saide for sluagad;
co Lug rinagach dia rigad
Illanach cen uarad.
.Xlstrok. do Lug ba lomda
i rrige ós brug Banba;
ni ranic nochtcholba nemda
octmoga don Dagda.
.X. &mdot;bliadna don Delbaeth dichra
co ríg remgáeth riachda;
cen locht os braine na mbethga.
a deich aile d'&Fdot;iachna.
Noí &mdot;bliadna fichet fos fogart
os chach fithirt dering.
i rrige for Banba banuill.
d'uib in Dagda for Herind.
Iar sain tancatar meic Miled.
rancatar dia ruadath
cland in merscáil móir ro maíded
a Hespain cen uarad.
Corod gonsat Gaedil gnithe
co ndoidin tria thuachle
ni di braisse ni di baithe
bec tasse na Tuathe. T.

Fland Manistrech cecinit.
EStid a eolchu cen on
mad ail dúib cor inniseor.
aideda co tuachle thall
forcla Tuathe De Danand.
Edleo mac Aldui na n-all
cet&fdot;er de Thuaith De Danand
dorochair i nHerind óig
do laim Nerchoin hui Simeóin.
Dorochair Ernmass ard a gal.
Fiachra echtach Etargal;
Tuirill Picreo baile Breg
i cetchath Maige Tuired.
Dorochair Elloth co n-ág
athair mórgarg Manannáin;
&ersir; Donand chomlan cain
la Dé &ndot;Domnand d'&Fdot;omorchaib.
Atbath Cethen &ersir; Cú.
do uathbas i nAircheltrú.
ro marbsat Céin cían o thaig.
Brian. Iuchurba &ersir; Iuchair.
Marb de gai gréne glaine
Corpre mór mac Etaine.
atbath Etan osind lind
de chumaid Chairpri chend&fdot;ind.
I Maig Tuired ba thrí ág
doceir Nuadu Argatlam.
&ersir; Macha iar samain sain.
do láim Balair Balcbemnig.
Docer Ogma cenchor fand.
la hInnech mac Dé Domnand
dorochair Casmael bruinne bil
la hOctrilach mac nInnig.
Marba de tham thregtach tra.
Dian Cecht &ersir; Gobnend goba.
docer Luigne in saer co se.
de ⋅aigit tréin tentide.
Ro báided Créidne in cerd cass.
forin lochmuir lindamnas;
oc tabairt méine óir.
dochum Herend a Hespain.
Atbath Bress i Carn hú Néit
do cheilg Loga cen lánbréic.
ropo domna trota trá.
ól rota i rricht ind lomma.
Be Chuille &ersir; Dianand dil
marba na dí bantuathig;
fescur co ndruidecht fo deóid.
re demnaib odraib aeóir.
Dorochair forin traig thair.
i fertaib Ratha Ailig;
Induí mór mac Delbaeth dil.
la Gand mac Dana dorngil.
Marb Fea ba buan a blad
i cind mís iarna marbad;
con raith chétna cubaid lind
do chumaid Induí &fdot;olt&fdot;ind.
Atbath Boind cosin &mdot;báig
ic topor meic Nectain náir.
docer Nechtain cosin neim.
la Siugmall ua soerMidir.
Abcan mac Bic Felmais uair.
fili Loga co lánbuaid.
docer la hOengus cen ail
i n-aír Midir morglonnaig.
Midir mac Indui aile.
docer de láim Elcmaire; ł
docer Elcmaire inn áig
de láim Oengusa im⋅láin.
Brian Iuchurba is Iuchair and.
trí dée Tuathe De Danand
marba oc Mana os Muir Mend
do láim Loga meic Ethlend.
Cermait mac in Dagdae de
ra geogain Lug scícmai&ndot;ge.
ba bara broin forsin maig.
i flaith Echach Ollathir.
Docer Cermait Milbél mas
la Lug mac Ethlend amnas;
ic ét ma mnaí mór in mod.
diaros bréc in druí dósom.
Do láim meic Dein Checht chen chaire.
dorochair in cruittire;
dorochair Lug os tuind tra
la Mac Cuill mac Cermata.
Docer Aed mac in Dagda
la Coirchend caem comchalma;
cen goí ropo dlug demne
iar ndul coa mnaí ar innerge.
Dorochair Corcend a Cruaich.
in tren&fdot;er amnas imlúaith;
dond ail turcaib forin tráig.
for lige Aeda imnáir.
Docer Crichinbél cláen camm.
primchainte Tuath De Danand
dond ór fríth forsin Banba báeth
do láim in Dagda ú Delbáeth.
Ic tiachtain a hAlpain úair.
do mac in Dagda drechruaid.
i n-inbiur na Bóinne i foss
is and ro báided Óengos.
Oenmac Manannain don méin.
cet⋅erc don ingin dobéil.
docer in mac maeth issin maig.
la Bennan baeth a Bregmaig.
Neit mac Induí 's a dí mnaí.
Badb &ersir; Némaind cen goí
ro marbtha i nAiliuch cen ail.
la Neptúir Derg d'&Fdot;omorchaib
Fuamnach fuam ba ben Midir.
Siugmaill is brí cen binib;
i mBrí Leith ba lathar lán.
ro loscthea la Manannán.
Docer mac Alloid co n-ág
in mind maínech Manannán;
isin chath i Cuillind chrúaid.
do láim Uillind Abratrúaid.
Dorochair Uillend co n-úaill
la Mac Grene co nglanbúaid.
docer ben in Dagdai duind
de thám for leirg i lLíathdruim
Marb in Dagda do gai chró.
issin Bruig ní himmargó.
diarod gon Cetnen in ben.
i cath mór Maige Tuired.
Docer Delbaeth is a mac.
la Cacher mac nár Namat;
docer Cacher con Bóind baith
do laim &Fdot;iachna meic Delbaith.
Docer Fiachna &ersir; Aí án.
la hEogan Inbir im⋅lán.
docer Eogan Inbir úair
la Eochaid Iúil iar macrúaid.
Docer Eochaid Iúil iar sain.
la hAed &ersir; la Labraid;
docer Oengus Aed.
la Cermait co cruth chomchaem.
Heriu &ersir; Fotla co n-úaill.
Mac Grene is Banba co mbúaid;
Mac Cuill. Mac Cecht co &ndot;glaine.
i cath Temra tondglaine.
Mac Cecht la Herimon án.
Mac Cuill la hEber im⋅lán;
Heriu sund re Surge iar sen.
Mac Grene la hAmargen.
Fótla re hEtan co n-úaill
la Cacher Banba co mbúaid.
finnaid is siat sein.
aideda na n-óc estid. E.
Is iat sen tuirtheda Tuathe De Danand.

Gaedil dano tucsam a n-imthechta ó Iaféth mac Noe &ersir; o Thur Nebróith ille. &ersir; amal tancatar a hEgipt &ersir; assin Scithia dona Gaethlaigib Meotecda &ersir; iar fut Mara Torrén. do Chréit do &Sdot;icil. &
dano atchuadammar amal ro gabsat Hespain ar écin. &ersir; fosracsamar oc Tur Bregoin i nHespáin. Adfessam díb sísana co min ifesta amal tancatar i nHerind.

Ith mac Bregoin atchonnairc Herind ar tús fescor gaimrid a mulluch Tuir Bregoin. Dáig is amlaid ł is ferr radarc duine
glan&fdot;escor gaimrid. Tanic Íth tri trichait laech dochum Herend &ersir; gabsat Brentracht Irruis Chorco Duibne in tansain tancatar. Baí i&mmacr; comdal fer &ndot;Herend ic Ailiuch Néit iar marbad Néit meic Induí Ailig la Fomóre. Batar na trí ríg ic roind chruid &ersir; sét rig Ailig. In

tansin tanic Ith mac Bregoin a Corco Duibne i Ciarraige. &ersir; i
lLuachair Dedad. i mMachaire Cliach. as fothúaid i nÉlib i tír Fer Cell. for fut Mide. i crích Luigne tar Slíab &ndot;Gúaire dar Feda Fernmaige. i fossud clair Fernmaige. dar cend Sleibe Bethach. i Sliab Toad. sin &mdot;Bocach Tíre Sírluim. i Crích Modorne i mMag nItha. do Ailiuch Néit.

Is and sin ro cocrad leo Íth do marbad &ersir; ro dlomsat dó a Herind. & tanic uadib a hAiliuch co Mag nItha. Tancas na diaid conice sin co torchair leo i mMaig Itha. Unde Mag nItha nominatur. Conid dia dígail Itha tancatar Meic Miled .i. Gaedil. Daig rucad
a chorp Itha co Hespain. Iss ed trá innisit eólaig is sesseor ar .xxx. do airechaib &ersir; do degdoínib tancatar Gaedil. & lo&ndot;g cach &fdot;ir díbside .i. .xxx. lo&ndot;g. &ersir; cethror ar fichet de mogadaib occo. &ersir; lo&ndot;g cach &fdot;ir dibside. &ersir; xxiiii. do mogadaib maróen ri cach mogaid in cach luing díb sin. doridise.

Is iat so in sessiur ar .xxx. do thoesechaib tancatar i nHerind. amal ro scríb Fintan mac Bochra Rúaid. .uii. &mdot;bliadna ria &ndot;dilind co secht &mdot;bliadna do &fdot;laith Diarmata meic Cerbaill. Ba sé sen
a ⋅aegul &Fdot;intain. for glún Finnen &ersir; Coluim Chille. & amal ro scrib Tuan mac Cairill i fiadnaise fer &ndot;Herend &ersir; Finnen Maige
Bile. & amal ro innisetar a daltaiside .i. Ladcend mac Baircheda. &ersir; Colmán mac Comgelláin. &ersir; Cend &Fdot;aelad mac Ailela. & Senchán mac Colaman Culad a Cruachnaib. &ersir; Bran Bairni. &ersir;c.

Is iat sin daltai &Fdot;inniain &ersir; Tuáin. & iss ed ro raidset conid iat so na sé toísig .xxx. at tancatar Gaedil i nHerind .i. x. meic Bregoin
&ersir; Ith in dechmad.
Oenmac Bile .i. Milid Espáine. Galam a ainm diles. ł

row.cell: Én mac Occe. Ún mac Ucce.

div1.p:
Tanic dano Lugaid mac Ítha in láech crúaid calma comnart
co nniurt céit and do dígail a athar immalle fri cách. In t-ochtmad mac do Milid .i. Airennán ósar na clainne. is é dochoid sin seólcrand. do descain na Herend co torchair assin t⋅eolcrand forsin farge. Co fil a &fdot;ert. &ersir; fert Scéne mnaa Amairgen dond leith aile. Atbath
for muir acco in ben. co n-érbairt in port i &ndot;gebamne biaid ainm
Scéne fair.

Doronsat meic Miled immarbáig imrama ic tiachtain dochum Herend assin baile i n&fdot;accatar Herind uadib. Co rruc díb Ír mac Miled murchrech do cach luing. Cor &fdot;ormtig Eber Dond mac Miled sinser na clainne. co n-erbairt. Nír fó líth li&ndot;ges Ír. sech
Íth .i. sech Lugaid mac Ítha. And sein ro memaid in ráma ro baí i lláim. Ír. co torchair dara ais síar co n-erbailt sin n-aidche ár cind. &ersir; co rucad a chorp i Sceliuc iar nIrrus descirt Chorco Duibne.
Ba toirsech trá Eber Find &ersir; Herimón &ersir; Amairgen iar n-éc a mbrathar. &ersir; atbertatar ba coir cenco tomled. Eber Dond in ferand maro
formtig a brathair .i. Ír. Iarnabárach ro hadnacht Scéne &ersir; Érennan
ic Inbiur Scéne. &ersir; ro hadnachta a ndís. & atát a da nduma. &ersir; a da fert taíb fri taíb and sin béus. Conid and sin atbert Amairgin.
Bad fert Scéne ba amne.
i&ndot;ge bid ainm Scéne bias for se.
bid fert Erennán co tí de
dia bás ind &fdot;iledse.
Ic tabairt a choisse dessi i nHerind asbert Amairgen Glúngel mac Miled in laídseo sís.

list.item: Am gáeth i mmuir. ar domni.
Am gai i fodb. feras feochtu.
Am dé delbas do chind codnu.
Cia dú i llaig funiud grene.
Cia beir búar o thig Temrach.
Cia dé delbas faebru. a ndind ailsiu.
Cáinté im gaí cainte gaithe. Am.

div1.p:
Item Amairgen cecinit.
Iascach muir.
mothach. tír.
tomaidm n-eisc.
iasca and. fothuind. én
lethach. míl
partach lág.
tomaidm n-eisc
iascach muir. Iascach. ł

I cind tri lá &ersir; trí n-aidchi iar sein ro brissiset meic Miled cath Slébi Mis for demno .i. for Tuaith Dé Danand. Is and dorochair Fés ben Úin meic Ucce. dia tá Fert Fése eter Sliab Mis &ersir; muir. Sliab Mis .i. slíab is messu fuaratar iar tiachtain Herend ar is and ro chuirset a cétchath i nHerind. No fothraic Lugaid mac Itha
i lLoch Luigdech. Ros fothraic dano Fial ben Luigdech sind abaind téit assin loch. Luid a fer chucci nocht. co n-accassa
ferda a fir. co n-erbailt ar náre. Unde Loch Luigdech. &ersir; Fíal &ersir; Inber Féile nominantur.

Imacallsat meic Miled i Sléib Mis &ersir; Banba. Asbert friu. mas
do gabail Herend tancabair nírbo chóir in sén i tancabair. Is dó écin ol Amairgen Glungel in fili. Ascaid damsa úaib dano or si. Cia ascid or siat. M'ainm forin innsiseo or si. Bid ainm dond indsiseo ol Amairgen. Acallsat Fotla i nÉblinniu. Atbert a cétna friu. &ersir; cuinchid a hainm forin n-insi. Atbert Amairgen bud ainm dond insiseo Fotla. Acallsat Herind i nUisniuch. Asbert friu. A ócu or si is mo chen dúib. Cían ó tá oc fádib far tuidecht. bud lib co brath ind insiseo. &ersir; ni bia co airther in domuin inis bus &fdot;err. Ni bia ciniud bas chomlániu inda for ciniudsi. Is maith sen ol Amairgen. is maith ind &fdot;astine. Ni
ria bérmait a buide ol Éber Dond sinser mac Miled acht riar &ndot;deib &ersir; riar cumachta féin. Cumma duit ol Ériu niba duit tarba na hindsiseo. &ersir; niba dot chlaind. Ascid damsa a maccu Miled &ersir; a chland Bregoin ol si .i. m'ainm forin n-insiseo. Bid e bas prímainm di ol Amairgen.
Lotar meic Miled &ersir; meic Bregoin co mbatar i nDruim Chain .i. Temair. Is and bátar tri ríg Herend .i. Mac Cuill. Mac Cecht Mac Grene. Fuigliset fri maccu Miled combad leo ind inis co

cend tri tráth. fri telcud ł fri tinól catha ł fri giallad. Dóig leo ní thoirsitís doridisi ar dogentais druid tinchetla na ndegaid ar-
ná fétaitis tictain arís.. Doberamne ar Mac Cuill mac Cermata amal atbera Amairgen bar mbrithem féin dúib. Dáig da ruca gúbreith bid marb linni. Beir in &mdot;breith a Amairgen ol Éber Dond. Atberimse ol Amairgen. Lecar dóib ind insisea. Cia
leth nod ragam ol Éber. Dar noí tonna amáin ol Amairgen. &
is sí sen cétbreth rucad i nHerind.

Amairgen cecinit.
Fir torachta tunnidé
dar noí tonna móra mo&ndot;glassa.
ní ragaid mani deib cumachtachaib
arlidir crib coternam
tunide tíre tarrechmar
macharaid domtha cert.
mani charaid na damaid
ní me asbeir frib.

Dorala coir gaethi dóib fo chetóir. Atbert Dond. Dobersa ar
se fo gin gai &ersir; chlaidib innossa na fail i nHerind. Ocus deligis in gaeth friu in lui&ndot;g i mbai Dond &ersir; Herech da mac Miled &ersir; in lui&ndot;g i mbaí Bress &ersir; Búas &ersir; Buagne. Coro baitte ocna Dumachaib
oc Taig Duind. Duma cach &fdot;ir and. & is and ro baded Díl ben Duinn amal rádit araile. Ingenside Miled. & Herimón fein dorat
fot furri. is fót for Díl seo ol se. Unde Fotla nominatur ut quidam putant.

Odba ingen Miled i&mmacr; mathair tri mac Herimoin .i. Mumne Luigne &ersir; Laigne. Is hí ro léic Herimon i nHespáin &ersir; tuc Tea dara cend. Tanic i&mmacr; Odba i n-óenlui&ndot;g fria maccaib anes. &ersir; is iat ros lessaig
co n-erbailt in Odba. Unde Odba. Tea i&mmacr; ingen Lugdach meic Itha is í thuc Herimón dar esi Odba &ersir; tilach no thogfad i nHerind
ina tindscra. iss ed caibchi ro thogastar. Druim Caín in tilach hísen .i. Temair Téa Múr. múr Téa ingine Lugdach meic Ítha. Lugaid .i. Lugith .i. Ith ropo lugu andás a athair.
Seólais Herimón .xxx. lo&ndot;g. lám des fri Herind sairthúaith. It iat so a toesig.

Brego It e i&mmacr; na .xiiii.
Murthemne mogaid .i. Ai.
Fuat Aidne
Cual&ndot;ge. Assal
Herimon Mide
Eber mac Ír Cuib
Amairgen Ceru
Colptha Sér
Mumne Slán
Luigne Ligen
Laigne Dul
Gosten Adal
Setga. Traig
Suirge Line
Sobairche
Gabsat Inber Colptha .i. Colptha mac Miled is é ro gab port
ar tus combad e a ainm no beth forin phort. Unde Inber Colptha.

Meic Bregoin i&mmacr; ni &fdot;arrgaibset iartaige. acht a n-anmand for
dindgnaib uaislib Herend. Noco n-innister clanna na fenned .i. Setga. &ersir; Gosten &ersir; Sobairche &ersir; Surgi. Amairgen is uad Corcu Achrach la hEle. &ersir; la hOrbraige. Corco Artbind &ersir; Corco Artbi.

Eber mac Ír. is uadside clanna Ollaman Fotla .i. clanna Rudraige. ł & is dia chlaindside Ulaid uile. Is dia chlaind
Conmaicne &ersir; Cíarraige &ersir; Corco M'ruad &ersir; Corco Duibne. Dál Moga Ruith .i. Fir Maige Féne. &ersir; Laigse Lagen. Araid Chliach &ersir; na .uii. Sogain.

Herimón i&mmacr; tóesech na lo&ndot;gse is uadside Leth Cuind .i. cethri fine Temrach .i. Conall. Colman. Eogan. Aed Slane. Is uad
téora Connachta. &ersir; Airgialla. Lagin &ersir; Ossairge. na Desi Muman. &ersir; Ernai Muman dia mbatar clanna Dedad. &ersir; dia mbai Conaire
Mór cona chlaind .i. fir Alban &ersir; Dál Riata. &ersir; na Múscraige. &ersir; Corco Bascind. &ersir; is d'Érnaib Muman Dál Fiatach .i. rígrad Ulad. Clanna Herimoin in sin. Is díb dano Fotharta dia tá Brigit. &ersir; Fintan
Cluana Eidnech. &ersir; Huí Ailella &ersir; Hui Cheochain de &Fdot;othartaib in sen uile.
Anais Eber thess .xxx. lo&ndot;g. It iat so a toesig.

Bili &ersir; Milid is dia claind Gaedil uile. Cúalo &ersir; Blad &ersir; Ebliu ni &fdot;argabsat cland acht a n-anmand for prím⋅líabaib. Nár mac Bili a quo Ros Náir. Nocon innister cland na fénned .i. Én. Etan.
Cacher Fulmán. Mantan. Ní &fdot;argaib Eber Dond ł Érech claind dáig ro baitté ut diximus.
Cethri meic Ebir. Aer. Orba. Feron. Fergna. niro thechtsatarside claind. &ersir; lethbliadain dóib i rríge Herend coros marb. Íriél.

Lugaid mac Itha cóic ciniuda úad. .i. fine Dáire Daimthig .i.
na cúic Lugdaig. Lugaid Cál a quo Calraige Connacht. Lugaid Corr a quo Corpraige. Lugaid Corp a quo Dál Corpri Cliach. ut alii dicunt. Lugaid Oircthe a quo Corco Oircthe. Lugaid Laeg a quo Corco Loegde. Dia mbaí mac Dairine .i. Lugaid Mac Con .i. Ailill Ólom is é rod ail. &ersir; ní étas uad cotlud ic neoch aile acht
la Elóir .i. cú baí ic Ailill Ólom.

Baí cosnam eter maccu Miled imon ríge .i. eter Eber &ersir; Hérimón. Co rucad Amairgen chucu do chóra eturru. Co n-erbairt Amairgen
orba in taesig .i. Duind don tanaise .i. do Herimón. &ersir; a orbaside
do Eber dia éis &ersir; nira gab Éber in sen acht roind Herend. ł Dáig is íat tri cétbretha ructha oc maccaib Miled i nHerind .i. in breth ruc Amairgen i Temraig. & in brethsain. i Sléib Mis. &ersir; in breth ruc Amairgen i Cind &Sdot;ále i mMumain. for ossaib &ersir; altaib &ersir; chethraib. Amal atrubairt in fili.
SUnd ruc Amairgen in &mdot;breith
ni chelat a chomathig
i n-iath Máland miad cen meth.
eter sluago mac Miled.
Ro mid do chach díb a chert.
dia mbatar con t⋅elgairecht
ruc leis cách a dliged cóir
trí chert Amairgen ardmóir.
Cetguinid clossach rofes.
cid fer cid cú cirres cnes;
d'arconaib ces nad chel.
tairr la tír i tairthither.
Lethe fir fenta ma connic.
d'iurn munel gerr garit
coin taffaind cossa na n-ag.
beth do lín nis tórmastar.
Inathar fir thic fo deoid.
cid maith cid saich leis in seól
is derb ni tuilter do de.
do dálaib na comrainne.
Comraind coitchend do cach oen
iarmotha sein ni seól sáeb;
cen &fdot;urail ille ł innund.
is í breth ruc Amargen sund. S.

Sessiur toesech tes tra fo deoid. &ersir; ui. toesig thuaid tarrasair
and. & ríge thess do Ébiur &ersir; ríge tuaid do Herimón. In sessiur thes .i. Eber fessin. Lugaid mac Itha. Etan mac Occe. Ún mac Ucce. Cacher. Fulmán. In sessiur thúaid .i. Herimon. Eber mac Ír. Amairgen. Gosten. Setga. Sobairche &ersir; Surge in sechtmad. Is de sin atrubairt Roigne file mac Ugaine Móir ri Mál mac Ugaine
ria brathair. Diar iarfact Mál can do thuirthecht. Conid and atbert Roigne.

.R. A meic áin Ugaine cia saig do rús Herind dergamne Scithia Fenius Forsaid fén saigis Nel Egipt. rersat ré ruidlis la Forinn fechtaib fornais Niuil Scotta combtar mathair Gaedil reithes Scott
comainm cain ingen Foraind tuath dagdea co tuthchatar co ort Olarbo din dibaid cain Crist debsus Muir Romair imratar muncind rergatar Scithia Eber Scott orthus ortatar Reflóir. Agnoman Lamind seolsat sech Caspión imluiset Libis cinset do Thorrian. sech sét sech Affraic. siachtatar Hespain i compert Herimón Eber do Milid.
mos broga Bili. do Ítha digail dáilset na scapháib .lx. a n-airm fir i fib fillsit Herind im dá sé saerglond sasai fir fenichas fris deib feig fochmarc.

Nó combad iat da sessiur atberad .i. ui. meic Miled &ersir; ui. meic Bregoin .i. Herimon. Eber. Lugaid. Amairgen. Colptha. Ir. Brego.
Bili. Fuat. Blad. Cualo. Cual&ndot;ge. Is amlaidsen tra gabsat Gaedil Herind. Finit dona gabalaib anuasana.

div1.head: Do &Fdot;lathiusaib Hérend
div1.p: Incipit do &fdot;lathiusaib Herend &ersir; dia hamseraib o ré Mac Miled co hamsir Tuathail Techtmair.

HISin chethramad amsir in domain táncatar Gaedil i nHérind
.i. i n-amsir Duída meic Iase. diar triallad tempul Solman &ersir; hi .xx.mad bliadain flathiusa imperii regis Asíriorum dia dardain arai lathe sectmaine. i k ł maí araí lathi mís greni. Ferthair cath ł i Taltin eter maccu Miled &ersir; Tuaith De Danand. Co torchratar and tri ríg Tuathe De Danand cona tri rígnaib. Dorochair ám
Mac Cecht la Herimón. Mac Cuill la Éber. Mac Grene la Amairgen. Heriu. re Surge. Banba re Cacher. Fotla re hEtan.

Isin bliadain iar sen cumtach Dúin Etain la Surge. &ersir; cumtach Duin Fine la Cacher &ersir; cumtach Delginsi Cualand la Setga. &
cumtach Dúin Náir i Sléib Modoirn la Gosten.

I cind bliadna iar sen .i. iar cath Talten fertha cath eter Herimon &ersir; Eber i mMaig Argetrois .i. ic cosnam Dromma Clasaig i crích Mane. &ersir; Dromma Bethaig i mMoenmaig. &ersir; Dromma Fingin i mMumain. ara torthige. Dorochair Eber Find mac Miled sin
chathsin. & dorochratar dond leith aile. Gosten. Sétga. Surge. na trí tóesig.

Gabais Herimón rige &ndot;Herend &ersir; ro classa da rígraith leis .i. Raith Oind i Crich Cualand &ersir; Raith Bethaig os Eóir. Dorat rige coicid Galian do Chrimthan Sciathbél de Domnannchaib. Dorat
rige Muman do chethri maccaib Ebir .i. Áer. Orba. Fergna. Feron. Dorat ríge cóicid Connacht do Ún mac Ucce. &ersir; do Etan. Dorat rígi cóicid Ulad do Ébiur mac Ír. a quo Ulaid Emna.

Hisind amsirsin tancatar Cruthnig co ngabsat Inber Sláne i nHuib Cendselaig. Ros léic Crimthan chuce. arin leges fuair
druí Cruithnech dó do chath fri Tuaith Fidga .i. tuath de Bretnaib. cach oen fori ndergtaís ba marb. &ersir; nis gaibtís acht iarna nemide. Conid é in leges blegon sé fichet bó mael find do dórtud isna hettrigib
bale i ferfaithe in cath Unde cath Ardda Lemnacht. & dorochratar uile Tuath Fidba triasin ceilgsin. Cora gaib Catluan mac Cing
do Chruthentuaid. nert mór for Herind. Coros innarb Herimon. Is and sin tanic Cruithnechan mac Cinge do chungid ban for Herimon. Co tarat Herimon dó mnaa na fer ro batte ocna Dumachaib .i. Bres &ersir; Bróes &ersir; Buagne. & ráth grene &ersir; ésca forra connabad lugu ro gabtha ferand ó feraib i Cruithentuaith indás
ó mnáib co bráth.

Hisind amsirsin Herimoin cumtach Duin Sobairchi &ersir; Duin
Chermna. &ersir; Duin Binni. &ersir; Cairge Brachaide. i mMurbulc la Mantan mac Cachir. Ocus cumtach Tochair Inbir Móir i crích Hua nEnechglais. Cualand la hAmairgen mac Miled. Ocus cumtach
Ratha Sailech i Fánat la Fulmán. Ocus Ráith Rigbaird i mMurisc la hEtan mac Occe.
Is na amsir tomaidm .uii. Rige Lagen. &ersir; tomaidm .uii. &mdot;Brosnach

Éle. & tomaidm Eithne i nHuib Neil. &ersir; tomaidm teora Socc la Connachta. &ersir; tomaidm Locha Riach. &ersir; Locha Ren. &ersir; Locha Cimbe.
&ersir; Locha Findmaige. la Connachta. &ersir; Locha Da Chaech i lLaignib. &ersir; Locha Laíg la hUltu. Ferthair cath eter Amargin &ersir; Cacher. i Cúil Chachir. &ersir; docer Cacher and. Ferthair cath eter Herimón &ersir; Amairgin .i. cath Bili Tened ł i mMide. &ersir; docer Amairgin in brithem &ersir; in fili and.

Mebais ria nHerimón cath Comraire i torchratar Én &ersir; Etan da mac Occe. &ersir; Ún mac Ucce. Atbath Herimon iar tain i nArgetros. &ersir; ro class a &fdot;ert and &ersir; sátir a lia .i. ic Raith Bethaig ós Eóir. i cind .xuii. &mdot;bliadan a flathiusa. & gabsat a tri meic ríge Herend &ersir; nos rannat Herind i trí .i. Mumne &ersir; Lugne &ersir; Laigne. Atbath
Mumne de thám i Cruachain. Docer Lugne &ersir; Laigne i cath Ardda Ladrand la maccu Ebir .i. Aer. Orba. Feron. Fergna. i tres bliadain a flathiusa. Ráthe dóibside i rríge co torchratar la hÍriel Fáid mac Herimóin.

Gabais Iriél Faid mac Herimóin ósar na clainne ríge Herend
iar tain. Ro slechta da mag déc laiss .i. Mag Rechet. &ersir; Mag Éli la Lagnib. Mag Commair. Mag Sleibe la Ú Néill. Mag Sanais la Connacta. Mag nDairbrech i mMide. Mag Techt la Hú Mac Cuais. Mag Lugna la Ciannachta Glinne Gaimen. Mag Faithne
lasna hAirthera. Mag Inis la Ultu. Mag Culi Feda la Airgialla. &
ro classa secht rígratha leis .i. Ráith Croich i mMaig Inis. Raith Bachair i lLatharnu. Raith Chuingeda i sSemniu. Raith Modig. Raith Buirg i Slectaib. Raith Lochit i &ndot;Glasscharn. Fich Iriel cath Arda Inmaith i Tethbu. i torchair Surge mac Duib. Brisis cath Tenmaige for Eochaid Echcend rí Fomóre. & cath Lochmaige
i torchair Lug Roith mac MaFemis. Atbath Iriel i mMaig Muade i ndechmad bliadain a flathiusa. amal ro chan in senchaid.
IRIel ósar na clainne
mac rig Fotla foltchaimme.
rí Sleibe Mis rí Macha
ro bris .iiii. cruadchatha.
Cath Cúile Martha maith sein
inro marbtha meic Ebir;
anmand doib ri cath ri clód.
Aer. Orba. Fergna. Ferón.
Cath Arda Inmaith atúaid.
i torchair Surge slattchrúaid;
cath Tenmaige ropo thend
i torchair Eocho Echcend.
Cath Lochmaige luad cen geis
i torchair mac MaFemis.
da mag déc derb lend uile
ro sléchta con degduine.
Díb Mag Séle sluinter lat.
Mag nÉle &ersir; Mag Rechet;
Mag Sanais. MagTecht cen tnú.
Mag Fáithne la hAirtheru.
Mag &ndot;Dairbrech i mMide marc
díb Mag Lugna la Ciannacht.
Mag nInis la Ultu iar tain.
Mag Cule Feda hi Ferndmaig.
Ro classa ic Iriél iar tain
.uii. ratha do rígrathaib
Raith Chróich i mMaig Inis áin.
Raith Chungida. Raith Bachair.
Raith Lochit. Raith Glaisse Cuilg.
Raith Móidig. &ersir; Raith Buirg;
x. &mdot;bliadna i flathius ba flaith.
do mac Herimoin ardmaith.
Mumne &ersir; Luigne is Laigne.
tri meic Odba cen anble;
Tea Temrach tend a treóir.
mathair irdairc Iareóil.

Gabais Ethriel mac Irieóil &Fdot;átha rige Herend &ersir; ro slechta .ui. maige lais ł .i. Tenmag la Connachta. Mag Lugair la Luigne. &ersir;
Mag Belaig la Hu Turtri. &ersir; Mag Gesilli la Hu Falgi. Lochmag la Conailliu. Mag Roth la Hu Echach Coba. Co torchair i cath Roírend la Conmael mac Ébir i ndigail a athar hi .xx. bliadain a &fdot;lathiusa is and fuair a aided la Conmael. Is do haidedaib na toisechsa anuas ro chan in senchaid so sis.
TOisig na llo&ndot;gse dar ler.
dia tancatar meic Miled.
bit mebra limsa rim lá
a n-anmand 's a n-aideda.
Ebleo Fuat Brego Blad bil.
Lugaid Murthemne milid.
Buas Bres Buagne na mbríg mór.
Dond. Ir. Eber. Herimon.
Amairgen Colptha cen chrád
Eber Herech Herennan;
Cual&ndot;ge. Cúalu. Nár amne
Mumne Luigne &ersir; Laigne.
Fulman. Mantán Surge ar sen.
Aer. Orba Feron. Fergen;
Én Ún. Etan. Gosten gle.
Setga Surge Sobairche.
Palap mac Herimóin áin.
&ersir; Cacher mac Mán táin.
do dígail Itha na n-ech.
dechenbor .xxx.a toesech. T.
Atbath Brego i mBregaib bind.
marb Murthemni con morlind;
Cual&ndot;ge &ersir; Fúat cencor fand
ro marbsat Tuath De Danand.
Dorochair Cualu ní chél.
la Crimthand scorach Sciathbél;
do thám Blad i mBladma bind
Nár &ersir; Ebleo i nEblind.
Amairgen file na fer.
marb i cath Bile Thened;
marb Ir i Scelic na scál.
marb conn Inbiur Erennán.
Dond is Bile is Búan a ben.
Díl is Érech mac Miled;
Buas Braes Buagne cosin &mdot;blaid.
ro báided ocna Dumachaib.
Dorochair Sobairche se&ndot;g
na dún re Echaid Echcend;
Mantan is Cacher na cned.
dorochair la hAmairgen.
Aided Fulmán co feraib.
la Hérimón ic Slemain;
dorochair Lugaid na land
i cath la Firu Domnand.
Dorochair Luigne is Laigne
la maccaib Ébir anble.
dorochair in cethrur cóir
la Íriél mac Hérimóin.
Cethri meic Ebir tall tra
Aer. Orba. Ferón Fergna.
ranic tarsna buidne a blad
atbath Mumne i mMaig Cruachan.
Sin chath for tenus na treb.
sin maig i torchair Éber;
torchratar malle.
Gosten Setga &ersir; Surge.
Ún mac Ucce ard a rath.
Én is Etan ildathach
Herimon bind na blaide.
ros ding i cath Comraire.
Docer Suirge mac Duib daith
la Iriél i nArd Inmaith;
Eber mac Ír fer inn óir.
la Palap mac Herimoin.
Palap uallach fúair rinni.
i cath gubach Gesilli;
a ⋅ain co cummair comse.
bás tóesech na loechlongse. T.
A Christ ós clannaib cuimnig.
mac meic &Fdot;laind a laechLuignib; ł
a Rí na mblat is na mbreth.
is tú in t-abb is tu in tóesech. T.

Conmael mac Ébir cétrí Herend a mMumain. Ro briss .xxu. for síl Herimóin. &ersir; baí .xxx. bliadan i rrige Herend. conid romarb Tigernmass i cath Oenaig Macha. i ndígail a athar &ersir; a ⋅enathar.
Is dó sein ro chan in senchaid.
COnmael cét&fdot;laith a mMumain
os Herind bá himchubaid;
dorochair Ethriél dia deóin
&ersir; Ollach mac Ethrioil.
Ro briss a llos chlaidib chróin.
for síl n-airdairc &ndot;Herimóin;
cath Éli. cath Berri bricc.
cath Slebi Betha bothbricc.
Cath Ucha. cath Cnucha chruim.
cath Slébe mónaig Moduirn.
docer i cath Moduirn moch.
Sémrath mac airdairc Imboth.
Cath Clére. cath Cairn Móir mind.
i torchair Ollach Imrind;
cath Locha Lén luath ro briss
for Mug Roith mac Mafemis.
Fri ré .xxx.at bliadan bil
ro giallad do mac Ebir;
dorochair i cath iar tain
la Tigernmas mac nOllaig.
Na hEoganachta malle
Ciannachta Galenga Luigne;
Dál Caiss Hui Echach co n-aíb.
is iat sain clanna Conmail. Con.

Gabais Tigernmas mac Ollaig ríge iar tain. &ersir; brissis tri noí catha re cind bliadna for claind Ebir. Is leis tuctha cuirn ar tus i nHerind. Is leis ro berbad ór ar tus i nHerind &ersir; dano tuctha datha for etaige. &ersir; corthara. Is leis doronta cumtaige &ersir; brettnasa óir &ersir; argait. Iuchadan ainm na cerda ro berb in n-ór hi Fothrib Airthir Life. &
baí .lxxuii. &mdot;bliadna i rríge Herend . & is bec naro dilgend claind Ebir frisin résin. Co n-erbailt i mMaig &Sdot;lécht i mmórdáil Maige
Slecht. &ersir; teora cethramthana fer &ndot;Herend malle ris. ic adrad Chroim Chróich. rígidail Herend. Conna térna amlaidsin acht óenchethramthu fer &ndot;Herend ass. Unde Mag Slect.

Is na ré tomaidm .uii. locha .i. Loch nAlinne. &ersir; Loch Cé la Connachta. &ersir; Loch nUair i mMide. &ersir; Loch Febail i Tir Eogain Loch Sílend i Cairpriu. Loch Gabur i mBregaib. &ersir; Daball i nAirgiallaib. Teora dubaibne Herend .i. Fubna. Torand. i Kalland.
Dorat in cethramthu thérna d'&fdot;eraib rige do Eochaig Étgudach
mac Dáire Domthig. do ⋅íl Lugdach meic Itha. Is aciside doronta ilbrechta i n-etaigib Herend .i. Oendath i n-étaig mogad. Da dath i n-étaigib aithech. Tri datha i n-etuch mogad &ersir; oclach. Cethri datha i n-etuch ócthigern. Cóic datha i n-etuch toísech. sé datha i n-etuch ríg &ersir; ollaman &ersir; filed .uii. &ndot;datha i n-etuch
rig &ersir; rigan. Is as sin ro ás indiu na huli datha i n-etuch epscop. Unde cecinit Gilla Coemain.
TIGernmas mac Ollaig aird
flaith forin &mdot;Banba brethgairg;
.uii. &mdot;bliadna ar .lxx. dó
i rrige for Gaedeló.
Leis ro berbad is blad bind.
méin óir ar tus i nHerind;
uane gorm corcair malle
leis tucad for etaige.ł
Leis dorochair Conmal cain.
cétrí Herend a mMumain
.xxuii. ro bris
for claind Conmail Co&ndot;ganchnis.
Cath Elle ba holc a ord.
i torchair in rí Rochorb
cath Lochmaige cen lemne
and dorochair Degerne
Cath Cuile Aird doss inn ag.
&ersir; cath Cuile Froechan.
Fróechan mór in t-echt and sein.
cath Maige Techt. cath Commair.
Cath Cuile Athgoirt tiar tra.
cath Aird Niad la Connachta
cath Cairn &Fdot;eradaig achtaig.
cath Cnamchaille i Connachtaib
Cath Cuile Feda fáth &ndot;gle.
&ersir; cath cruaid Co&ndot;gnáige.
cath Tethba tend a meisce.
cath Cluana mín Murisce.
Da chath Chuile lim malle.
cath Éle &ersir; cath Berre
&ersir; uii. catha ni gó
ic Loch Luigdech i n-oenló.
Da chath aile ma raclos.
sinn oenúair i nArgetros;
tri catha for Firu Bolg.
cath for Erna nirb anord.
I n-amsir Tigernmais tall.
ro maidset .uii. lochmadmand;
Loch nÚair i mMide mod &ndot;gle.
Loch Cé. Loch nAlinde
Loch Silend i Cairpriu chain.
Loch Febail i Tír Eogain
Loch Gabor in ríg ríaraig.
maidm Dabaill i nAirgiallaib.
Madmand trí &ndot;dubaband and.
Fomna Torand is Challand
i mMaig Slecht sin Brefni braiss
airdairc aided Tigernmais. T.
Fir Alban Lagin Leth Cuind
Clanna Luigdech i lLiathdruim;
Eogan. Clanna Conaill Chais
is iat sin síl Tigernmais. T.
Crist cosin &mdot;bríg cosin &mdot;blaid
fortaill for cach ríg roglain.
flaith .ix. &ndot;grád n-adbal nime
Rí in talman co torthige. T.

Gabsat Sobairche &ersir; Cermna Find ríge &ndot;Herend .i. da mac Ebric meic Ébir meic Ir .i. do Ultaib. cétríg Herend a hUltaib. Randsat
Herind ar dó. Cechtar de assa dún .i. Dún Sobairche &ersir; Dún Cermna. Is lasin Cermna darochair Eochu Étgudach i cath Temra. Bátar .xl. bliadan i rríge. Dorochair Sobairche la hEcaig Minn mac ríg Fomóire. Dorochair Cermna la Eochaig Find Faeburglas mac Conmail i cath Dúin Chermna. ut dicitur.
Aided Sobairche na dún
la Eochaig Mind darin mur.
aided Cermna sin chath cass.
la Eochaig Find Faeburglass.
Dun Sobairche dian sluaglind
rían go ruadrind fua remm;
telchaind fri muir móir maídim.
erchaill aíbind ar Herind.
Archoin Emna diar mined.
dalthuir dremna fri dulad.
co n-ímdaib calmaib caurad.
do rígnaib amraib Ulad
Áit i mbaí ind rigan rúanaid.
Cheltchair chuanaig cauir chéilig.
Findabair find a glégen.
sech ba femen ba fennid
Fírinad fírmaith fodla.
díndliged &ndot;dinmaith &ndot;delbda
mór fognítis róit romra.
dún i mbitis óic Emna.
O lotar Ulaid úate.
túate triath di maig thriata;
tartsat a firmoi&ndot;g féta
ros gabsat rigdroi&ndot;g riata.
Rígrad rogaide rádim.
silblad Chonaire chaem⋅ei&ndot;g;
cland iar fír feib adfeidim.
ríg ro gab Herind oíbind
Uair is Patraic ro &fdot;orcan
is friss daldait a torcrad.
ro altaig beirt co mbalcblaid
do macaib Eirc is Olcan.
Uair rus bennach mac Calpraind.
fosfuair tellach dia degclaind;
raith co lleithet uas luchtlind.
go bráth nis trefit echtraind.
Sobairche sluagach slegda
tualaid telaigthe Temra
rannta leis bruig bind Banba
fri ci&ndot;g calma fri Cermna. ł
Co fail an dún dilend
ergna rún rethaib remend
uas tuind tibrig fria tóraind
sund for dib n-imlib Herend
Is Dún Sobairche slegach.
helad féraigthe Ulad
dún Cermna nad chress celar.
tess for muir medach Muman.
Maithi di ríg dorímim.
flathi fír feib adfeidim
go tadgbríg roptar tualai&ndot;g
robdar arddig ar Érind
Ed rí amsir áig indua.
Nuadat Fáil fine Temra;
ranta a gelaigthe glanda.
eter Sobairche is Cermna.
Is cían taidbsiu a córad.
cían ría n-amsir Mac Miled;
for ar firu feib adfiadar
ro giallad an dro&ndot;g duned. D.
Adram Ríg gel gréne
cond mo chéille cét rúne;
ro sern cach rath cach rige.
ro delb díne cech dune. D.

Gabais Eocho Faeburglas mac Conmail rige Herend. & is e
ro bris cath Luachra Dedad &ersir; cath Fossaid da Gort. & cath Commair Tri nUsce. &ersir; cath Tuamma Drecon. cath Dromma Liathán.Is and dorochair Smirgoll mac Imbotho meic Tigernmais. Ro slechta
.uii. maige leis. .i. Mag Smerthach la Hu Falge. Mag nAidne &ersir; Mag Luirg la Connachta. Mag nEmir &ersir; Mag Lemna &ersir; Mag Fubna &ersir;
Mag Da Gabul la Airgialla. in sein. Dorochair Eochaid la Fiachaig Labrainne mac Smirguill meic Smertho meic Enbath meic Tigernmais i cath Charmain i ndigail a athar. Unde poeta cecinit.
EOcho Faebor na fene.
nirbo baegul da díne;
ro chaith hua Ébir iarum
.xx. bliadan i ríge.
Dia láim docer cen lesce
Cermna Fáil find a thuicse.
&ersir; Imboth hua Ollaig
i cath Chommair Tri nUsce.
Cath Fossaid dá Gort curad.
cath Tuamma Drecon dreman;
for Smirgoll cona thuatha.
ro bris cath Luachra Dedad.
Docer re Eochaid uathmar
hua Tigernmais na triathlam;
mac Imboth Smirgoll somma
i ndebaid Dromma Liathán.
Ro slechta leis co slemne
.uii. maige certa cuibde;
Mag Smerthach la Hú Falgi
Mag nAidne. Mag Luirg. Mag Luigne
Mag Lemna &ersir; Mag nÉnir
Mag Fubna find a &fdot;orod.
ri mac Conmaíl co nglaine
ri táeb Maige Da Gabol.
La mac Smirguill co n -áne
Fiacha Labraind co lleire.
docer a &fdot;ríth a baegul
Eochu Fáebor na féine. E.

Gabais Fiacha Labraind mac Smirguill meic Enboth meic Tigernmais ríge Herend. Is na amsir tomaidm Fleisce &ersir; Manne &ersir; Labrainne. Fích cath for fairge fri claind Ébir. Fich cath
Gatlaig i torchair MaFemis mac Echach Faeburglais. Fích cath for
Érnaib do &Fdot;eraib Bolg i mbale i fail Loch Erne. Iar &mdot;brissiud in chatha ro memaid in loch .i. Loch dar Ernu uile in sein. Dorochair Fiacha Labraind i cath Sleibi Belgadain ł la Eochu Múmo mac Mafemis. o ráter Mumu.

Gabais Oengus Olmucaid mac Fiachach rige &ndot;Herend. & ro bris Cath Clere. &ersir; cath Cuirche &ersir; cath Slebe Calge .i. i crích Corco Bascind for Martiniu ro brissed. Cath Glasse Froecháin i torchair Froechán fáid. & ro bris .l. catha for Cruthentúaith. & for Firu
Bolg. & da chath déc for Lo&ndot;gbardu & .iiii. catha for Colósib. Cath Cúle Ratha i nDesmumain for Marthu. &ersir; cath Cairn Richida for Marthu béus. & cath Sleibe Cua for Ernu. & cath Ardachaid i
torchair Smirgoll mac Smértha rí Fomore. Is na amsir tomaidm Locha Oenbethe la Hu Cremthaind & Locha Sailech &ersir; Locha Cassan
&ersir; Murbrucht eter Eba &ersir; Ros Céte la Hú Fiachrach. Ro slechta .uii. maige lais .i. Mag nOensciad la Lagniu. Mag Glinni Dechon
la Cenel Conaill. Mag Cúli Cóel la Cenel &mdot;Bógaine. Ailmag la Callraige. Mag Mucrima &ersir; Mag Luirg la Connachta. Mag Luachra Dedad. Mag ar Caill la Ciarraige Luachra.
Is desin ro chan in senchaid.
Oengus Olmuccaid amra.
robo rí don roBanba;
.uii. &mdot;bliadna fo thrí cen tnú.
iar marbad Echach Múmu.
Maith in rí roga flatha.
rias róímid .c. crúadchatha.
ri táeb in choicat co rath
ro bris for firu Alban.
Ro bris da chath déc iar tain.
i lLetha for Longbardaib
ria nOengus Macha cen baís.
cethri catha for Colaís.
Cath Clére. cath Cuirche cais.
cath Slébe Cailce celtbrais;
cath Rois Fraecháin rinnib ga
&ersir; cath Cairn Ríchida.
Cath Cuili Ratha. cath Cua.
for Ernaib ní scel scíathgua;
cath Ardachaid ard a bla.
i mbíth Smirgoll mac Smertha.
Tomaidm .iiii. loch for leth.
Loch Oenbethi. Loch Sailech.
Loch Cassán Murbrucht mod gle
eter Eba is Ros Céte.
Ro slecta .uii. maige leis.
Mag Glinni Dechon drechdeis;
Mag Mucrima monor cían.
Mag Cúli Cael Mag nOenscíad.
Ailmag Mag ar Caill na clad.
&ersir; Mag Luachra Dedad.
riasin caemdos co cét rath
uile ri Oengus nÓlach. Oengus.

Dorochair trá Oengus Olmucaid la Enna nAirgdech mac Echach don Mumain i cath Charmain. Unde poeta cecinit.
OEngus Olmucaid atbath
rod marb Énna mac Echach
i cath Charmain cetaib cend
i mbatar amrai Herend.
Enna ba flaith Fail co fraig
é ro dáil do Gaedelaib;
eich &ersir; carpait raclos
scéith argait i nArgetros.
Apraid a aided iar mbuaid
for maigib Raigne rorúaid;lstrok
la Rothechtaid raen Rossa
la mac Máen meic Fergossa.
Ba ri Gialchad gualu in gráid.
diarbo mac Nuado Find Fáil.
ba rí Sirna mac Déin dail
&ersir; ba rí Rothechtaid.
Ro acht Nuadu nert cen raind,
ro smacht slúago síl Bregaind.
cid fí féig⋅eng fíal mod
ba rí Herend a oenor. O.
Iar sain tic díne nUlad
ro gabsat rige rubach;
leo ro rímed rigda tor.
mag Mac Miled a n-oenor. O.
Cretem in Trinóit treoda.
Rí cach rígroit rodeoda
fail baí bias fri cach ler
is dias is triar is oen&fdot;er. O.

Gabais dī Enna Airgdech ríge &ndot;Herend. Is leis darónta scéith airgdide i nArgatros. & dorat do airechaib Herend. & baí .xxuii.
&mdot;bliadna i rrige Herend co torchair la Rothechtaid mac Máen meic Oengusa Olmucada i cath Roigne.
Ba rí Rothechtaid dano fri ré da bliadan ar .xx. conid romarb Setna Airt mac Airt meic Ebir meic Ír do Ultaib i Cruachain do chommairge a meic .i. Fiachach Finscothaig.
Baí Setna .u. bliadna i rrige Herend conid romarb a mac iar tiachtain don lo&ndot;gais. i Ráith Chruachan.
Bai Fiacha .xx. bliadan i rríge. Scotha fína inna &fdot;laith co fásctís i llestraib glaine. Dorochair iar sain la Munemón.
Gabais Munemón rige &ndot;Herend fri ré .u. &mdot;bliadan Is leis ro tinscantá munceda óir fo braigtib doene i nHerind .i. muin maíne .i. maíne fo munelaib. Co n-erbailt de tham i nAidniu.

Gabais Aildergdóit mac Munemóin meic Cais Clothaig meic Airir Arda meic Rothechta meic Rosa meic Glais meic Nuadat Declaim meic Echach Faeburglais meic Conmáil meic Ebir meic Miled. Is na amsir batar falge óir im dóitib. Dorochair la Sín mac Déin. ut quidam dicunt. ł is la Ollomain Fotla mac Fiachach
Finnscothaig dorochair i Temraig. quod uerius est.

Ollam Fotla mac Fiachach Finnscothaig i rríge iar tain fri re .xl. bliadan. Is uad ainmnigther Ulaid .i. Olléith ó Ollomain. amp
is leis cetna dernad Feis Temrach. & is aici darónad Múr nOlloman hi Temraig. & ro gab seisiur dia chlaind ríge Herend cenech eturru.
& éc a óenur atbath ina múr.
Finnachta mac Olloman snechta fína baí inna &fdot;laith. Do thám atbath i mMaig Inis la Ultu. xx. bliadan dó i rríge.

Slánoll mac Olloman ní baí galar inna &fdot;laith &ersir; ni fes ca galar rodnuc. acht a &fdot;agbáil marb. sech nir ⋅áe dath. nira lob a chorp.
& tucad a talmain lia mac la Ailill dia &fdot;is i cind .xl. bliadan.
Gabais Geide Ollgothach mac Olloman ríge Herend ba binnithir téta mendcrott ł guth &ersir; amor cach duine inna flaith.

Is leis conróttacht Dún Culi Sibrilli .i. Cenannais. Iss ed tucad bó cend&fdot;ind Herend leis. Dorochair tra Fíac la Berngal mac Géde
i ndigail a athar féine.

Gabais Berngal mac Géde rige &ndot;Herend. Is na remis luide ith a Herind ar immad in chocaid. & dorochair iar tain la Ailill mac Slánuill. Gabais Ailill mac Slanuill iar tain co torchair la Sirna mac Déin. meic Denuil. Is desin ro chan Ferchertne.
OLlom Fotla fechair gal.
dororaind Múr nOlloman
cetna rí ruanaid
lassi ndernad feiss Temrach.
.L. bliadan ba ceól bind.
baí i n-ardríge for Herind;
conid uad fri sáere son.
gabsat Ulaid ainmnigod.
Gabsat sé ríg réim co nġail
for Herind ó Ollomain;
da cét .x. &mdot;bliadan balc tnú
ni thuthchid nech eturru.
Fínnacta Slánoll co rath.
&ersir; Geide Ollgothach;
Fiacc. Ailill armgáeth co rrath.
&ersir; in badblaech Berngal
Ba hOllom ardu can ail.
mac féig Fiachach Finscothaig
uasli cach rí rígda a drech
do chlannaib Ír meic Miled.
Mórchland Rudraige rad &ndot;gle.
curaid chroda Chraebruade;
asa inud úall ros gab
iss é ciniud Olloman. O.
Labraid Lo&ndot;gsech lór a lín.
ro hort Chobthach i nDind Rig;
co slúag láignech dar lind lir.
dib ro hainmnigthe Lagin.
Eocho Mumo mó cech breis.
rí Herend mac MaFemis.
is uad ainm Muman cen mair.
ainm Ulad ó Ollamain. O.

Sirna tra mac Dein meic Demail meic Rothectaid meic Maín meic Oengusa iss e ro scar flathius Ulad ri Temraig. & is é ro
diglastar Rothectaid mac Maín senathair a athar forro. Is é in
Rothechtaid ro marbsat Ulaid i fill hi Cruachain. Dorochair Berngal la Sírna mac Dein ind sin. maróen &ersir; Ailill. &ersir; dorochair leis Ailill iar tain. Is é Sírna baí .c. bliadan i cocud for Ulto. Gabais ríge iar tain. is é ro bris cath Aircheltra for Ulto. &ersir; cath Sleibe Airbrig. &ersir; cath Cind Duin i nAsul. &ersir; cath Móna Foíchnig la
Hú Falge for Martinu &ersir; for Érnu. Is na amsir slógad ar tus i nHerind. & is na amsir cath Móna Trogaide i Ciannacht .i. Lugáir mac Lugdoth tuc leis Fomórchu dar Herind.

Ro thinolsat fir Herend do chath fri Lugáir co Móin Trogaide. In tan batar oc slaide in chatha dofurmi tám forro co n-apthatar
fir Herend and. &ersir; co n-erbailt and Lugóir &ersir; Ciasarn rí Fomorach. & rí Herend Sirna. ut quidam dicunt. Acht atberat araile eólaig is i nAlind dorochair la Rothechtaid Rotha mac Roain. quod uerius est.

Is do hein ro chan in file so sís.
SIRna sáeglach sáer in flaith
.l. ar .c. bliadan bithmaith;
a sáegol fo chorthair cain.
co torchair la Rothechtaid.ł
Tomaidm Scirtige na ré.
&ersir; tomaidm Duailte.
na ré ro mebaid immach
Níth nemide nemannach
I n-amsir Sirna meic Déin.
tinscanad slogad slatréid;
ruc cách de chrích Mide immach
fri huct fine Fomorach.
Ro fích Sirna srethaib ga.
cath Cind Dúin. cath Aircheltra.
cath Mona Foichnig fáth bil
na da chath i Sléib Airbrig.
Airdairc and in cath aile
ro gniad for Moin Trogaide;
i torchratar na tolaib
fir Hérend is Fomóraig.
Ro thuitt Lugáir mac Loga
ic imthríall na himgona.
&ersir; Ciasarn cen trot tra.
maith is nirb oll la Sirna. S.

lg.l: In sluag tánic don chath chlé.

div1.p: Dorochair tra Sírna la Rothechtaid i nAlind. Baí Rothechtaid Rotha .uii. &mdot;bliadna i rrige &ndot;Herend coro loisc tene geláin i nDún Sobairche. Is leis arricht carpat cethri n-ech i nHerind ar tús.
Gabais Ellim Ollfín⋅necta ríge Herend oenbliadain co torchair la Giallchath mac Ailella Olchaín meic Sírna.
Gabais Giallchath ríge fri ré .ix. &mdot;bliadan tuc giall cach cóic&fdot;ir a mMumain Co torchair i mMaig Múade la Art Imlig mac Ollfín⋅nechta.
Gabais Art Imlig ríge Herend da bliadain déc. & ro classa .uii. &ndot;dúine leis. Conid romarb Nuadu Find Fáil mac Giallchatha.
Baí Nuadu Find Fáil .lx. bliadan i rríge Herend. Dorochair la Bress Nuado Rí mac Airt Imlig.
Gabais Bres rige &ersir; ro bris ilchatha for Fomóri co n-erbailt i Carn Chonlúain.

Eochu Apbthach de Chorco Laigde oenbliadain i rrige iar tain.
tám cach mís inna &fdot;laith .i. da thám déc sin bliadain. Dorochair Eocho la Find mac Blatha meic Labrada Condilg meic Corpri meic Olloman Fotla. ł combad de thám atbailed.

Gabais Find mac Blatha ríge fri ré .xx. bliadan co torchair la Setna Innarraid mac Bresse a mMumain. Setna Narrad mac
Bresse iss é toísech dorat chrod d'amsaib i nHerind .i. Innarrad. Baí .xx. bliadan i rrige Herend co torchair la Simón &mdot;Brecc.

Simón Brecc mac Aedain Glais meic Nuadat Find .ui. bliadna
i rrige Herend. Co torchair la Duach Find mac Setna Innarrad.

Duach Find .x. &mdot;bliadna conid romarb Muridach Balgrach mac
Símoin. ł
Muridach mí &ersir; bliadain dó i rrige co torchair la hEnna &ndot;Derg mac &ndot;Duach.
Enna Derg dá bliadain dec dó i rrige co n-erbailt de thám i Sléib Mis co sochaide móir imme.
Lugaid Iardond mac Énda .ix. &mdot;bliadna i rríge co torchair la Sírlam i rRaith Clochrain.
Sírlám mac Find .xiii. bliadna i rrige conidro marb Eocho Uairchess mac Lugdach. Rosaiched a lám lár &ersir; sé na sessom.

Eochu &ersir; Conai&ndot;g coic bliadna i com&fdot;laith indara leth d'Eochaig &ersir; in leth aile do Chonai&ndot;g .i. in leth tuascertach do Chonai&ndot;g. Dorochair Eocho Fiadmuine la Lugaid mac Echach Uaircheis.
Lugaid .uii. &mdot;bliadna co torchair la Conaing &mdot;Bececlach.
Conaing Bececlach .x. mbliadna dó i n-ardríge na Herend. Is aire atberthé Bececlach uair ni thánic úair n-ómain ł ecla dó ríam. Conid romarb Art mac Lugdech.

Art mac Lugdech meic Echach .ui. bliadna i rrige Herend Co
torchair la Duach Ladraig mac Fiachach Tolcgraig. &ersir; la Fiachaig feisen.
Ailill Find mac Airt .ix. bliadna i rrige co torchair la Argatmár &ersir; la Fiachaig &ersir; la Duach mac Fiachach immalle.

Fecta cath eter Argatmár &ersir; Fiacha Tolcrach i nÓenuch Thalten.
co rroímid for Argatmár. Fechta cath eturru i mBregaib co torchair Fiachra Tolcrach sin chathsin.
Tinolait fir Muman iar sein im Echaig mac Ailella Find &ersir; im Lugaid mac Echach Fiadmuine &ersir; im Duach Ladrach co síl Herimóin. &ersir; innarbsat Argatmár dar muir ri ré .uii. &mdot;bliadan.
Eocho mac Ailella Find frisin resin i rrigi Herend co toracht Argatmár dar muir &ersir; co nderna síd ri Duach Ladrach co torchair leo Eochu i nOenuch Áne.
Argatmár .xxx. bliadan iar tain i rrige co torchair la Duach Ladrach &ersir; la Lugaid Laídech. mac Echach
Duach Ladrach i rríge iarum .x. &mdot;bliadna conid romarb Lugaid Laídech.
Lugaid Laídech .uii. bliadna dó i rríge co torchair la Áed Ruad mac Bóduirn meic Argatmair.

CID dia tá Emain Macha. Ni handsa. Trí ríg bátar for Herind
i com&fdot;lathius. Do Ultaib dóib .i. Dithorba mac Dimmáin a hUsniuch Mide. Aed Rúad mac Báduirn meic Argaitmair a Tír
Aeda. Cimbaeth mac Fintain meic Argatmair a Finnabair Maige Inis. Doniat córa iarum na rígsin. ł .uii. &mdot;bliadna cach &fdot;ir dib i rríge. Trí secht &mdot;bliadan Rátha eturru .uii. &ndot;druid .uii. filid
.uii. n-ócthigirn. Na .uii. &ndot;druid dia rímsad tria brictu. Na .uii. filid dia &ndot;glámad &ersir; dia n-er&fdot;uacra. Na .uii. toísig dia guin &ersir; dia loscud meni &fdot;ácbad in fer díb in ríge i cind .uii. &mdot;bliadan. Co comet fir flatha .i. mess cacha bliadna &ersir; cen meth rúamna cech datha &ersir; cen mna d'écaib de banaidid. Timchelsat teora cúarda
cech &fdot;ir díb i rríge .i. lxui. Aed Ruad trá atbath díb ar tús .i. bádud ro báded i nEs Ruaid. &ersir; co tucad a chorp issin sídsin. Unde Síd nÁeda &ersir; Ess Rúaid. Ní &fdot;argaib in tAedsin claind acht oeningen .i. Macha Mongrúad. a hainmside. Conattaigside sel a hathar don ríge. Atbert Cimbaeth &ersir; Dithorba ni thibertaís rige do mnaí.
Fechta cath eturru. &ersir; maidid in cath re Macha. Dorumalt .uii. mbliadna i rrige. Dorochair Dithorba i Corund foíside.

Forácaibside cóic maccu maithe .i. Baeth. &ersir; Bras. Bétach &ersir; Uallach &ersir; Borbchas. Conatchetarside ríge. Atbert Macha na tibred dóib ar ní ó ráthaib tuc. acht a rroí chatha ar écin. Fecta
cath eturru. Brissis Macha in cath for maccaib Dithorba. Co fargaibset ár cend aicce. Coro chuir iat ar innarba iar tain i ndíthrubaib Connacht.

Tuc Macha iar sain Cimbaeth chucci do chéile di. &ersir; do thaisigecht a amsaige imme. O ro batar oentadaig trá Macha &ersir; Cimbáeth
luid Macha do íarair mac &ndot;Dithorba i rricht chlaimsige .i. táes secail &ersir; rota ra comled impe. Conos fuair i mBairind Connacht. oc fune tuirc allaid.
